67_0._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (S) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, that enemy will be invulnerable to all friendly skills. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Insect Consumption'.

67_1.name: Insect Barricade
67_1._originalDescription: The following turn, the first new harmful skill used on one ally or Aburame Shino (S) will be countered, 'Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation' will be placed on the countered enemy and then activated. If this skill does not counter an enemy skill, Aburame Shino (S) will gain 1 red energy. This skill is invisible.

67_2.name: Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation
67_2._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (S) targets one enemy. After 3 turns, they will take 25 affliction damage and all other copies of this skill on them will be activated. This skill is invisible.

67_3.name: Insect Cocoon
67_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Aburame Shino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

67_4.name: Insect Consumption
67_4._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (S) steals 1 random energy from one enemy affected by 'Insect Swarm' and increases the damage that enemy receives from 'Insect Swarm' by 5 that turn.

68_0.name: Pressure Point Closure
68_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hinata (S) targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage to them, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn, and removing all stacks of 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' from them (including the skill itself). During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

68_1.name: Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists
68_1._originalDescription: This skill deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each 'Pressure Point Closure' stack. Once used, this skill removes all stacks of 'Pressure Point Closure' from the targeted enemy.

68_2.name: Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field
68_2._originalDescription: For 4 turns, if an enemy uses a new harmful skill, the energy cost increase of 'Pressure Point Closure' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently.

68_3.name: Byakugan Sight
68_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

69_0.name: Shadow Sewing
69_0._originalDescription: Nara Shikamaru (S) deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by Long-Range Tactics, it will deal 10 additional damage.

69_1.name: Long-Range Tactics
69_1._originalDescription: Nara Shikamaru (S) targets one enemy. That enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned 2 turns and Nara Shikamaru (S) will be invulnerable during this time.

69_2.name: Expert Analysis
69_2._originalDescription: For 3 turns, any time that one target enemy uses a new skill, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all helpful counters and reflect skills on them will be ignored for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

69_3.name: Panicked Dodge
69_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

70_0.name: Expansion Technique
70_0._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Akimichi Chouji (S) gains 25 points of destructible defense, Spiked Meat Tank will do its alternate effects and have 1 less turn of cooldown, and Mega Palm Thrust will be improved.

70_1.name: Spiked Meat Tank
70_1._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouji (S) targets one ally or himself and will counter all enemy non-mental skills used on the target for 1 turn. The countered enemies will take 25 damage. This skill is invisible. Alternate: Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

70_2.name: Mega Palm Thrust
70_2._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. During Expansion Technique, this damage is improved to 40, the targeted enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn, and this skill has an 1 turn cooldown.

70_3.name: Effortful Block
70_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

71_0.name: Mind Body Switch
71_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (S) targets one enemy. After 1 turn, that enemy will take 15 damage and if that enemy uses a new harmful skill during this time, they will be countered and this skill will be replaced by the skill they used for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected and is invisible.

71_1.name: Proxy Surveillance
71_1._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (S) targets all enemies. For 3 turns, everytime they use a new skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. During this time, all new invisible skills they use will become visible. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

71_2.name: Mind Clone Switch
71_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, both of Yamanaka Ino (S)'s allies will ignore all harmful effects other than damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible and will end if Yamanaka Ino (S) dies.

71_3.name: Hide
71_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

72_0.name: Leaf Rising Wind
72_0._originalDescription: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns. This skill will deal 10 additional damage, and the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn for each ally that is dead.

72_1.name: Leaf Great Whirlwind
72_1._originalDescription: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to one enemy and gaining 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will deal 10 additional damage and grant 10 additional damage reduction. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for every ally that has been killed.

72_2.name: Maximum Force Blast
72_2._originalDescription: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. This skill will deal 15 additional damage for each ally that is dead and 15 additional damage for every 30 health that Rock Lee (S) has lost.

72_3.name: Jumping Dodge
72_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Rock Lee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

73_0.name: Kunai Grenade
73_0._originalDescription: Tenten (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

73_1.name: Chain Spin
73_1._originalDescription: Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

73_2.name: Weapon Upgrade
73_2._originalDescription: Tenten (S) gains 5 points of destructible defense. The first time this skill is used, it will replace 'Kunai Grenade' and 'Chain Spin'. The second time it is used, they will be replaced again. The third time this skill is used, it will reset, and her skills will revert back to the original ones.

73_3.name: Leaping Dodge
73_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Tenten (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

73_4.name: Heavenly Chain Disaster
73_4._originalDescription: Tenten (S) deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies.

73_5.name: Iron Protection Wall
73_5._originalDescription: Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn and grants them 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This effect stacks.

73_6.name: Bashousen: Coil of Wind
73_6._originalDescription: The following turn, any new non-mental skill used on Tenten (S) or her team will be reflected onto the character who used it. This skill is invisible.

73_7.name: Bashousen: Coil of Fire
73_7._originalDescription: Tenten (S) targets all enemies, dealing 10 damage and 10 affliction damage* to them. They will then receive 5 affliction damage* for the following 3 turns.

74_0.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm
74_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Neji (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

74_1.name: Eight Trigrams Mountain Crusher
74_1._originalDescription: Hyuuga Neji (S) targets one enemy, destroying any destructible defense they have and dealing 45 damage to them.

74_2.name: Byakugan - Eight Trigrams Field
74_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Hyuuga Neji (S) will be countered and this skill will be replaced by 'Pressure Point Strike'. This skill is invisible.

74_3.name: Byakugan Defense
74_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Neji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

74_4.name: Pressure Point Strike
74_4._originalDescription: Hyuuga Neji (S) attacks one enemy countered by 'Byakugan - Eight Trigrams Field' or this skill, dealing 5 damage and removing 1 random energy from them. The following turn this skill will deal 5 additional damage and will remain replaced. This effect stacks and is cumulative until Hyuuga Neji (S) stops using this skill.

75_0.name: Lightning Beast Fang
75_0._originalDescription: Hatake Kakashi (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Raikiri'.

75_1.name: Kakashi Kamui
75_1._originalDescription: If used on an enemy, they will receive 40 piercing damage, and for 1 turn their cooldowns will be increased by 1 and their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. If used on an ally or himself, all harmful effects on them will be removed and they will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

75_2.name: Team Tactics
75_2._originalDescription: For 3 turns, Hatake Kakashi (S)'s allies will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1. The following 3 turns, the first new harmful skill used by one enemy will be copied and will replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

75_3.name: Bunshin Stand-in
75_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

75_4.name: Finishing Raikiri
75_4._originalDescription: Hatake Kakashi (S) targets one enemy, dealing 30 piercing damage to them. This skill will deal 10 additional damage to that enemy if they are stunned or if 'Lightning Beast Fang' was used on them the previous turn.

76_0.name: Bliss-Bringing Hands
76_0._originalDescription: Yamato targets one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them and making them ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn.

76_1.name: Wood Release: Wood Clone
76_1._originalDescription: Yamato targets one ally or himself for 1 turn, countering the first physical, energy or strategic skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the enemy and granting that ally 20 points of destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

76_2.name: Wood Release: Four-Pillar Prison
76_2._originalDescription: This skill can be used on one enemy or one ally. If used on an enemy, that enemy will have their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. If used on an ally, that ally will gain 40 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.

76_3.name: Wood Release: Wood Shelter
76_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamato invulnerable for 1 turn.

77_0.name: Nunchaku Taijutsu
77_0._originalDescription: Maito Gai (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new harmful physical skill on Maito Gai (S), he will deal 10 damage to them.*

77_1.name: Fiery Kick
77_1._originalDescription: Maito Gai (S) targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them and reducing all non-affliction damage they deal by 20 for 1 turn.

77_2.name: Single Gate Release
77_2._originalDescription: Maito Gai (S) receives 5 affliction damage*, but permanently gains 5 points of damage reduction and increases the damage of 'Nunchaku Taijutsu' and 'Fiery Kick' by 5. At 6 usages of this skill, 'Fiery Kick' will be replaced by 'Morning Peacock', and at 7 usages of this skill, it will be replaced by 'Daytime Tiger'. This skill can only be used 7 times.

77_3.name: Muscle Block
77_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Maito Gai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

77_4.name: Morning Peacock
77_4._originalDescription: Maito Gai (S) deals 60 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

77_5.name: Daytime Tiger
77_5._originalDescription: Maito Gai (S) deals 300 damage to one enemy.

78_0.name: Thousand-Armed Murder
78_0._originalDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense and instantly deals 30 damage to one enemy.

78_1.name: Ash Pile Burning
78_1._originalDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies. He targets all enemies each turn, increasing the cooldowns of their skills by 1 turn. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.

78_2.name: Decapitate
78_2._originalDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is 25 or less, he will instantly kill that enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

78_3.name: Evasion
78_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

78_4.name: Ash Pile Burning - Ignite
78_4._originalDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for each stack of 'Ash Pile Burning' on them. This skill will end 'Ash Pile Burning', it cannot be countered or reflected, and it ignores invulnerability.

79_0.name: Scattering Thousand Crows Technique
79_0._originalDescription: Yamashiro Aoba deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, Yamashiro Aoba and his team will have 5 points of damage reduction.* This skill can stack.

79_1.name: Crow Assault
79_1._originalDescription: Yamashiro Aoba deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time that enemy cannot use skills with a non-conditional stun effect (this is a stun effect).

79_2.name: Convergence of a Murder
79_2._originalDescription: Yamashiro Aoba targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each active 'Scattering Thousand Crows Technique' on the target.

79_3.name: Crow Shield
79_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamashiro Aoba invulnerable for 1 turn.

80_0.name: Mace Crush
80_0._originalDescription: Izumo and Kotetsu deal 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Guided Shell Mace' can be used.

80_1.name: Guided Shell Mace
80_1._originalDescription: Izumo and Kotetsu deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy, decrease their non-affliction damage by 5 for 1 turn and make them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill requires either 'Mace Crush' or 'Syrup Snare Field' to be used the previous turn.

80_2.name: Syrup Snare Field
80_2._originalDescription: Izumo and Kotetsu make their team invulnerable to physical and affliction skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Guided Shell Mace' can be used.

80_3.name: Lunging Dodge
80_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Izumo and Kotetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

81_0.name: Summon Kuromaru
81_0._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Fierce Bite' and any enemy that uses a new harmful non-affliction skill on Inuzuka Tsume will receive 10 damage.

81_1.name: Passing Fang
81_1._originalDescription: Inuzuka Tsume deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. All stun skills that enemy uses will also be decreased by 2 turns. If 'Summon Kuromaru' is active, this skill will deal 5 additional damage.

81_2.name: Flashbang
81_2._originalDescription: Inuzuka Tsume targets herself and her allies, making them invulnerable to non-affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times in a game. This skill cannot be removed.

81_3.name: Man-Beast Defense
81_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Inuzuka Tsume invulnerable for 1 turn.

81_4.name: Fierce Bite
81_4._originalDescription: Inuzuka Tsume targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them that ignores invulnerability. If that enemy dies that turn, then for 2 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will have her non-conditional damage increased by 10, she will ignore enemy stun effects, and she cannot be killed.

82_0.name: Chain Bind
82_0._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouza deals 5 damage to one enemy and lowers all physical and energy damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn. Akimichi Chouza's team will also gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense.

82_1.name: Chouza Meat Tank
82_1._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouza targets one enemy for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to them and granting his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. During this time, the damage lowering effect of 'Chain Bind' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

82_2.name: Partial-Size Smash
82_2._originalDescription: This skill can be used on a member of Akimichi Chouza's team or one enemy. If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on a member of Akimichi Chouza's team, for 1 turn the next non-mental harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 10 damage. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.

82_3.name: Chouza Block
82_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Akimichi Chouza invulnerable for 1 turn.

85_0.name: Payback
85_0._originalDescription: Morino Ibiki permanently gains 10 points of damage reduction. For the rest of the game, Morino Ibiki can use this skill to deal 10 damage to one enemy, and 5 additional damage for each time a new damage skill was used on Morino Ibiki since this skill was used. This damage resets each time it is used.

85_1.name: Summoning: Iron Maiden
85_1._originalDescription: Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, each time that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense when this skill is used.

85_2.name: Summoning: Torture Chamber
85_2._originalDescription: Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and mental skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns, each turn that enemy does not use a new skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense when this skill is used.

85_3.name: Close Evasion
85_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Morino Ibiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

88_0.name: Master Gentle Fist
88_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hiashi deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. The following turn, another random enemy will take 20 damage and lose 1 random energy.

88_1.name: Master Revolving Heaven
88_1._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hiashi becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns.

88_2.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Wall Palm
88_2._originalDescription: The next turn, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on one ally or Hyuuga Hiashi will have that skill reflected back to one random enemy. This skill is invisible.

88_3.name: Hiashi Byakugan
88_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

89_0.name: Kunai Wave
89_0._originalDescription: Aburame Torune targets one enemy, whose skills will cost 1 additional random energy for 2 turns*. All allies of that enemy will take 15 damage for 2 turns.

89_1.name: Insect Armor
89_1._originalDescription: Aburame Torune gains 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of destructible defense permanently. During this time any enemy that uses a new skill on him will take 5 affliction damage instantly and 5 additional damage from 'Nano Beetles' permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be removed from Aburame Torune.

89_2.name: Nano Beetles
89_2._originalDescription: Aburame Torune targets one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This skill cannot be ignored or removed and this skill stacks.

89_3.name: Retreat
89_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Aburame Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

90_0.name: Tanto Slash
90_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Fu deals 25 damage to one enemy.

90_1.name: Quickened Mind Body Switch
90_1._originalDescription: Yamanaka Fu targets one enemy, stunning all their friendly skills and making them invulnerable to all friendly skills for 2 turns.

90_2.name: Mind Puppet Switch
90_2._originalDescription: Yamanaka Fu targets one ally or himself. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a physical, energy or strategic skill against the target of this skill will be countered. The countered enemy will have all their skills replaced by 'Mind Puppet Switch - Attack' for 2 turns, take 20 additional damage from 'Tanto Slash' also for 2 turns and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

90_3.name: High Jump
90_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Fu invulnerable for 1 turn.

90_4.name: Mind Puppet Switch - Attack
90_4._originalDescription: This skill deals 10 damage to one enemy.

91_0.name: Vacuum Sphere
91_0._originalDescription: Shimura Danzo deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 10 additional damage to an enemy stunned by Self-Cursing Seal.

91_1.name: Self-Cursing Seal
91_1._originalDescription: Shimura Danzo targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 20 piercing damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. This skill is replaced by Reverse Four Symbols Sealing for 1 turn after used.

91_2.name: Major Summoning: Baku
91_2._originalDescription: Shimura Danzo targets all characters, first removing all active skills from them and then dealing 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns.

91_3.name: Izanagi
91_3._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Shimura Danzo will ignore all enemy damage dealt. This skill is invisible and will have its cooldown increased by 1 turn each time it is used. After used, this skill will be replaced with Hostage Shield for 1 turn.

91_4.name: Reverse Four Symbols Sealing
91_4._originalDescription: Shimura Danzo deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. Shimura Danzo will also take 10 affliction damage and remove all enemy skills on himself.

91_5.name: Hostage Shield
91_5._originalDescription: For 1 turn, all harmful skills used on Shimura Danzo will be reflected to one target enemy instead. This skill is invisible.

92_0.name: Heavenly Spear Kick
92_0._originalDescription: Tsunade (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If an ally was affected by 'Enhanced Healing Wave' the previous turn, they also cannot be killed 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will destroy destructible defense and it will deal 40 piercing damage, but will cost 1 additional random energy.

92_1.name: Enhanced Healing Wave
92_1._originalDescription: Tsunade (S) targets one ally, healing them for 40 health. If empowered, this skill will heal 50 health instead.

92_2.name: Tsunade: Strength of a Hundred Seal
92_2._originalDescription: Tsunade (S) heals herself for 25 health. The next two times Tsunade (S) uses a skill, it will be empowered. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade (S) for 50 health and grant her 2 random energies.

92_3.name: Tsunade Protection
92_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Tsunade (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will make Tsunade (S)'s entire team invulnerable for 1 turn.

93_0.name: Wood Release: Wood Dragon
93_0._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to energy skills* and he will steal 1 random energy from one enemy each turn.

93_1.name: Wood Release: Wood Human
93_1._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to physical skills* and he will deal 20 damage to one enemy each turn.

93_2.name: Wood Release: True Thousand Hands
93_2._originalDescription: Senju Hashirama grants 30 points of destructible defense to himself and his allies for 3 turns. For 3 turns, Wood Release: Wood Dragon' and Wood Release: Wood Human' will last 1 additional turn and cost 1 random energy less.

93_3.name: Sage Knowledge
93_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Senju Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

96_0.name: Weighted Net Scroll
96_0._originalDescription: Maki gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, if any enemy uses a new skill on Maki, their skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This effect ignores invulnerability. This skill is invisible.

96_1.name: Humidified Cloth
96_1._originalDescription: Maki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.

96_2.name: Binding Cloth
96_2._originalDescription: Maki targets one enemy dealing 25 damage to them and then stunning their non-mental skills for 2 turns. During this time this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills.

96_3.name: Cloth Shelter
96_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Maki invulnerable for 1 turn.

97_0.name: Kuroari Trap
97_0._originalDescription: Kankuro (S) targets one enemy, countering any harmful skill they use for 1 turn. If countered, that enemy will take 100% more damage from Karasu Knives the following turn. This skill is invisible until triggered.

97_1.name: Karasu Knives
97_1._originalDescription: Kankuro (S) targets an enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 affliction damage.*

97_2.name: Sanshouo Shield
97_2._originalDescription: For 3 turns, Kankuro (S) and his allies will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage. This skill becomes Defensive Puppet Control for 3 turns after used.

97_3.name: Puppet Distraction
97_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kankuro (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

97_4.name: Defensive Puppet Control
97_4._originalDescription: Kankuro (S) targets one ally or himself, granting them 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

98_0.name: First Moon
98_0._originalDescription: 'Wind Scythe' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. Temari (S) gains 15 points of damage reduction permanently and this skill becomes 'Second Moon' permanently when used.

98_1.name: Ally Protection
98_1._originalDescription: Temari (S) targets one ally. For 1 turn, that ally will gain 20 points of damage reduction and they cannot be killed.

98_2.name: Wind Scythe
98_2._originalDescription: Temari (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy.

98_3.name: Fan Offensive Defense
98_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Temari (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

98_4.name: Second Moon
98_4._originalDescription: Temari (S) ends 'First Moon'. Temari (S) gains 5 points of damage reduction and 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction permanently and 'Wind Scythe' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill becomes 'Third Moon' permanently when used.

98_5.name: Third Moon
98_5._originalDescription: Temari (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes them deal 5 less damage for 1 turn.

99_0.name: Father and Mother
99_0._originalDescription: Chiyo targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new physical skill, they will take 10 damage. During this time, this skill and 'Chikamatsu Collection: Ten Puppets' will be replaced by 'Puppet Performance: Two as One' and 'Puppet Performance: Weapon Enhancements'. This skill ends if Chiyo dies.

99_1.name: Chikamatsu Collection: Ten Puppets
99_1._originalDescription: Chiyo gains 10 points of damage reduction permanently. During this time, 'Father and Mother' and this skill will be replaced by 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1' and 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 2'. 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1' and 'Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 2' cycle between their effects with each use.

99_2.name: One's Own Life Reincarnation
99_2._originalDescription: Chiyo targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health. Chiyo will instantly die when this skill is used. This skill can only be used if Chiyo has 50 or less health and its self-death effect cannot be ignored. This skill cannot be countered.

99_3.name: Skillful Block
99_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Chiyo invulnerable for 1 turn.

99_4.name: Puppet Performance: Two as One
99_4._originalDescription: Chiyo targets herself or one ally for 1 turn, making them ignore enemy damage for 1 turn. During this time, the first enemy that uses a new skill on that target will take 15 damage and will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

99_5.name: Puppet Performance: Weapon Enhancements
99_5._originalDescription: Chiyo deals 5 damage to all enemies and targets her allies for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that target them with a new skill will be dealt 10 damage.

99_6.name: Chikamatsu Artillery: Set 1
99_6._originalDescription: Dual Blades: Chiyo deals 20 damage to one enemy. / Small Bombs: Chiyo deals 20 affliction damage* to one enemy. / Spinning Orb: Chiyo deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. / Sealing Lion Head: Chiyo stuns one enemy's physical and strategic skills for 2 turns.

During this time, whenever they use a new energy skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

131_2.name: Samehada Fusion
131_2._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and ends 'Samehada Interception' on himself. For the rest of the game, if a new energy drain or removal skill is used on him, he will gain 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Water Prison Shark Dance' permanently after used.

131_3.name: Water Isolation
131_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 3 turns this skill can be used again to instead give Hoshigaki Kisame (S) 2 random energies and then kill him instantly. This self-death effect cannot be ignored.

131_4.name: Samehada Frenzy
131_4._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy.

131_5.name: Water Prison Shark Dance
131_5._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy. For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will take 10 damage. During this time, their energy skills will deal 15 less damage and cost 1 additional random energy.

132_0.name: Susanoo Activation
132_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) takes 10 affliction damage*. His skills become their alternate versions and he gains 5 permanent stacking destructible defense each turn. If used again, his skills return to their original versions and he loses all destructible defense from this skill.

132_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This skill becomes Totsuka Sword during Susanoo Activation. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

132_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) targets one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new skill, their skills will be stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible and becomes Yata Mirror during 'Susanoo Activation'.

132_4.name: Totsuka Sword
132_4._originalDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

132_5.name: Yata Mirror
132_5._originalDescription: For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on Uchiha Itachi (S) will be countered. The countered enemies will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

221_1._originalDescription: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to one random enemy for 2 turns. During this time, they will have the cost of their non-strategic skills increased by 1 random energy. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill targets a specific enemy instead of a random enemy.

221_2.name: Scorching Lava Sea
221_2._originalDescription: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill will have no cooldown.

221_3.name: Retreat
221_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Roshi invulnerable for 1 turn.

221_4.name: Rising Lava Extent
221_4._originalDescription: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, they will take 10 affliction damage if they use a new harmful skill.

222_0.name: Chakra Sharpening
222_0._originalDescription: Han reduces the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently. For the rest of the game, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release'. During this time, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Han, he will be healed for 5 health and will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn (both effects happen before he is affected by the harmful skill).

222_1.name: Boil Release: Unrivalled Strength
222_1._originalDescription: Han deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release: Steam Dash'. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 20 affliction damage instead.

222_2.name: Kokuou's Reactive Tailed-Beast Bomb
222_2._originalDescription: Han targets one enemy. For 1 turn their skills will deal 100% less damage and if they use a new harmful skill they will take 40 piercing damage and will be stunned for 1 turn. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 15 less damage. This skill is invisible.

222_3.name: Disengage
222_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Han invulnerable for 2 turns. During 'Chakra Sharpening' this skill will last 1 less turn and will have 1 less cooldown.

222_4.name: Boil Release
222_4._originalDescription: Han ends 'Chakra Sharpening' and gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Chakra Sharpening' permanently.

222_5.name: Boil Release: Steam Dash
222_5._originalDescription: Han deals 15 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn, they will take 10 additional damage from affliction-only skills. For 1 turn, Han will gain 10 points of destructible defense and will deal 5 damage to every enemy that uses a new skill on him. The following turn, this skill will remain replaced. This effect is cumulative until Han stops using this skill.

223_0.name: Sage Art: White Rage
223_0._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time they cannot use skills with a counter effect (this is a stun effect).

223_1.name: Sage Art: Inorganic Reincarnation
223_1._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto targets all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, their physical and strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy, their energy skills will deal 10 less damage and their mental and affliction skills will be stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

223_2.name: Sage Chakra Transfer
223_2._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto targets one ally, granting them lifelink for 3 turns.

223_3.name: Strange Transmission Distant Shadow
223_3._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto uses this skill. This skill will be replaced by 'Jiroubou: Arhat Fist' permanently after used.

223_4.name: Jiroubou: Arhat Fist
223_4._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill becomes 'Kidoumaru: Spiral Web' after used.

223_5.name: Kidoumaru: Spiral Web
223_5._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto targets himself or an ally. The following turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be countered. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill becomes 'Tayuya: Demonic Flute' after used.

223_6.name: Tayuya: Demonic Flute
223_6._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto stuns all enemies' non-mental skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Sakon and Ukon: Rest' after used.

223_7.name: Sakon and Ukon: Rest
223_7._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto heals himself for 40 health. This skill becomes 'Kimimaro: Dance of the Seedling Fern' after used.

223_8.name: Kimimaro: Dance of the Seedling Fern
223_8._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto deals 30 damage to all enemies and reduces their physical and energy damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. This skill becomes 'Orochimaru: Regenerative Bite' after used.

223_9.name: Orochimaru: Regenerative Bite
223_9._originalDescription: Sennin Kabuto steals 40 health from one enemy. This skill becomes 'Jiroubou: Arhat Fist' after used.

224_0.name: Cursed Byakugan Activation
224_0._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Hizashi will lose 1 less energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction and his skills will do their alternate effects.

224_1.name: Gentle Fist: Air Palm
224_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Alternate: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy, removes 1 random energy from them, and stuns them for 1 turn.

224_2.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
224_2._originalDescription: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or on an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn and will counter all harmful skills used on him for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage and Edo Tensei Hizashi will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. Alternate: This skill's effects are all applied regardless of its target. This skill is invisible.

224_3.name: Gentle Fist Guard
224_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hizashi invulnerable for 1 turn. Alternate: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, their damage will be reduced by 20 for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

225_0.name: Burning Tail Slam
225_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku deals 30 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 5 health.

225_1.name: Imbued Chakra Release
225_1._originalDescription: Permanently, 'Burning Tail Slam' will deal 5 additional damage after each time it is used. During this time, Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku can use this skill again to gain 1 random energy.

225_2.name: Golden Bloodlust
225_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku gains 5 points of damage reduction permanently. He will gain 5 points of damage reduction permanently everytime he is targeted by a new harmful physical or energy skill. This skill stacks and cannot be used while active.

225_3.name: Taunting Scream
225_3._originalDescription: For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 5 less physical and energy damage and all new harmful skills used on Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku's allies will be reflected to him. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends when Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku dies.

226_0.name: Insect Dispersion
226_0._originalDescription: Aburame Shibi targets all enemies, dealing 5 affliction damage to them, reducing their non-affliction damage by 5 and making them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Secret Technique: Insect Sphere' will be improved.

226_1.name: Strategical Insect Placement
226_1._originalDescription: For 2 turns, any enemy that uses a new skill on Aburame Shibi will lose 1 random energy, take 5 affliction damage instantly and then take 5 affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

226_2.name: Secret Technique: Insect Sphere
226_2._originalDescription: Aburame Shibi deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. If 'Insect Dispersion' was used the previous turn, this skill will also steal 1 random energy from the target each turn.

226_3.name: Self-Protective Insect Barrier
226_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Aburame Shibi invulnerable for 1 turn.

227_0.name: Samehada Bite
227_0._originalDescription: Samehada Bee deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

227_1.name: Sealing Technique: Octopus Hold
227_1._originalDescription: Samehada Bee deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn.

227_2.name: Samehada Kenjutsu
227_2._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Samehada Bee will have 10 points of damage reduction, 'Samehada Bite' and 'Sealing Technique: Octopus Hold' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Partial Beast Hand Protection' will cost 1 random energy instead. During this time, Samehada Bee will gain 1 random energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him.

227_3.name: Partial Beast Hand Protection
227_3._originalDescription: For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on Samehada Bee will be countered, the countered enemy will take 20 damage and Samehada Bee will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

228_0.name: Ash Pile Burning
228_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Asuma targets all enemies making them unable to use skills with stun or counter effects (this is a stun effect) and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The following turn, they will take 15 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.

228_1.name: Ash Pile Burning - Ignite
228_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Asuma deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to non-physical skills for 1 turn.

228_2.name: Experienced Taijutsu
228_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Asuma deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 3 turns they will take 5 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite' and 'Ash Pile Burning' will last 1 additional turn on them. This skill stacks.

228_3.name: Constant Deflection
228_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Asuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

229_0.name: Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing
229_0._originalDescription: Butterfly Chouji (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and then makes them deal 5 less damage with physical skills permanently. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if it's used. This skill ends if Butterfly Chouji (S) dies.

229_1.name: Giant Hand Prison
229_1._originalDescription: Butterfly Chouji (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' will be applied one more time if it's used.

229_2.name: Chakra Overcharge
229_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Butterfly Chouji (S) will gain 1 random energy everytime a new harmful skill is used on him. During this time, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' and 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if they are used. This skill is invisible.

229_3.name: Offensive Cover
229_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Butterfly Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

230_0.name: Psycho Mind Transmission
230_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Inoichi targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns this enemy will be unable to use any counter or reflect skills (this is a stun effect). This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

230_1._originalDescription: Yamanaka Inoichi targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new harmful skill, this skill will gain one stack and Yamanaka Inoichi will be healed for 10 health. During this time, Yamanaka Inoichi can use this skill again for 1 random energy to instead gain 1 random energy for each stack on it and also be healed for 5 health for each stack on it and this skill will end.

230_2.name: Mental Invasion
230_2._originalDescription: For 4 turns, all invulnerability skills one target enemy uses will last 1 less turn. During this time, everytime a new harmful mental or strategic skill is used on this enemy, the user of that skill will become invulnerable to physical, energy and affliction skills for 1 turn; this invulnerability can only be ignored by skills that directly ignore invulnerability.

230_3.name: Mobile Barrier
230_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Inoichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

231_0.name: Cat Claw
231_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yugito deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used, 'Fire Release: Mouse Hairball' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

231_1.name: Fire Release: Mouse Hairball
231_1._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Yugito deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and 10 affliction damage to all other enemies. The main target will have their physical and energy skills stunned each turn for 2 turns. The other enemies' stun skills will last 1 turn less for 2 turns.

231_2.name: Matatabi Awakening
231_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yugito removes all stun skills on herself, grants herself 30 points of destructible defense and grants her allies 15 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, her team will ignore enemy stun effects. This skill becomes 'Flaming Punch' for 4 turns after used.

231_3.name: Cat Agility
231_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Yugito invulnerable for 1 turn.

231_4.name: Flaming Punch
231_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yugito deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and removes all harmful stun skills on herself and her allies. For 1 turn, any direct stun skill used on the target will last 1 additional turn on them.

232_0.name: Water Release: Water Mirror
232_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yagura targets himself or an ally. The next turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be reflected back to one random enemy. For 1 turn, all destructible defense skills used by the target of this skill will grant 15 additional destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

232_1.name: Coral Palm
232_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yagura targets one enemy. For 1 turn, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. For 2 turns, they will take 20 damage. For 3 turns, all destructible defense skills they use will grant 15 less destructible defense. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

232_2.name: Isobu Awakening
232_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yagura destroys all enemies' destructible defense and then grants himself and his allies 25 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, all destructible defense skills Edo Tensei Yagura's team use will grant 5 additional destructible defense. This skill becomes 'Leaping Bullet Shell Tower' for 4 turns after used.

232_3.name: Flee
232_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Yagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

232_4.name: Leaping Bullet Shell Tower
232_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Yagura deals 30 damage to one enemy and grants himself and his allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

233_0.name: Amaterasu
233_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy each turn and makes them ignore healing effects permanently. This skill ends when either Edo Tensei Itachi dies or uses any new skill.

233_1.name: Crow Illusion
233_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Itachi will ignore all harmful effects except energy cost changes. During this time, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on him will have their non-affliction damage lowered by 15 that turn and for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

233_2.name: Izanami
233_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, they will be countered. If successfully countered, all their skills will be replaced by ' Redemption' for 2 turns and during this time, everytime they don't use a new skill, they will take 25 piercing damage. This skill is invisible until triggered.

233_3.name: Skeleton Susanoo Activation
233_3._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense and for 1 turn he will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage. The first time this skill is used, Edo Tensei Itachi's other skills will be replaced. The second time this skill is used, they will be replaced back.

233_4.name: Yasaka Magatama
233_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, ' Skeleton Grip' will also stun its target for 1 turn.

233_5.name: Skeleton Grip
233_5._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Yasaka Magatama' will deal 10 additional damage.

233_6.name: Totsuka Sword Sealing
233_6._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Itachi deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

233_7.name: Redemption
233_7._originalDescription: This skill makes one enemy invulnerable for 1 turn.

234_0.name: Hidden Chain Wrap
234_0._originalDescription: Masked Man deals 20 damage to one enemy. If 'Kamui: Dimensional Placement' isn't active on that enemy, any direct stun skill used on them this turn will stun them for 1 additional turn. If it is active on them, this skill will instead deal 35 damage.

234_1.name: Kamui: Dimensional Placement
234_1._originalDescription: Masked Man targets himself and one enemy, making both invulnerable to harmful skills for 3 turns. During this time, Masked Man's skills will ignore invulnerability.

234_2.name: Major Summoning: Kurama
234_2._originalDescription: Masked Man deals 25 damage to all enemies. Until Masked Man dies, everytime they use a new physical, energy or mental skill, they will deal 5 less damage with skills with that specific class for 2 turns (this is applied before the skill they used takes effect). This skill becomes 'Kurama's Tailed-Beast Bomb' permanently after used.

234_3.name: Intangibility
234_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Masked Man invulnerable for 1 turn.

234_4.name: Kurama's Tailed-Beast Bomb
234_4._originalDescription: Masked Man deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn.

235_0.name: Earth Grudge Fear
235_0._originalDescription: For 1 turn, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy and True Form Kakuzu's and his allies' skills will cost 1 less random energy.

235_1.name: Strange Mask Exploding Flame
235_1._originalDescription: True Form Kakuzu deals 50 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be reflected.

235_2.name: Heart Link
235_2._originalDescription: True Form Kakuzu targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable and all new harmful skills used on True Form Kakuzu will be reflected to them. For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Piercing Tendrils'.

235_3.name: Tendril Defense
235_3._originalDescription: This skill makes True Form Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn. If this skill is used one turn after 'Earth Grudge Fear', True Form Kakuzu will also gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

235_4.name: Piercing Tendrils
235_4._originalDescription: True Form Kakuzu targets the enemy affected by 'Heart Link', dealing 20 piercing damage to them.

236_0.name: Box of Ultimate Bliss
236_0._originalDescription: Satori targets all characters permanently. They will ignore all friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities on them. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 10 piercing damage to all enemies and heal Satori and its allies by 10 health. This skill ends if Satori dies or if it's removed from any character affected.

236_1.name: Feather Launching
236_1._originalDescription: Satori targets all characters, dealing 10 damage to them permanently. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 15 damage to all enemies and make them ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill ends if Satori dies or if it's removed from any character affected.

236_2.name: Giant Sphere
236_2._originalDescription: Satori deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Giant Sphere' will permanently deal 15 less damage and will cost 1 less random energy. These effects stack but are only applied on the first 2 usages of this skill.

236_3.name: Speed Flight

238_0.name: Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan
238_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will have 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. This skill becomes 'Great Fire Annihilation' permanently after used.

238_1.name: Rinnegan
238_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will deal 5 affliction damage to any enemy that uses a new skill on him. This skill becomes 'Tengai Shinsei' permanently after used.

238_2.name: Susanoo
238_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will gain 5 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. This skill becomes 'Yasaka Magatama' permanently after used.

238_3.name: Hashirama's Cells
238_3._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will be healed for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Nativity of a World of Trees' permanently after used.

238_4.name: Great Fire Annihilation
238_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. If 'Rinnegan' is active, for 2 turns any member of Edo Tensei Madara's team that target any of the affected enemies with a new skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same main class as the skill they used; this invulnerability can only be ignored by skills that directly ignore invulnerability. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

238_5.name: Tengai Shinsei
238_5._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 50 damage to one enemy. After 3 turns, this enemy will take another 50 damage. If 'Susanoo' is active, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Edo Tensei Madara will ignore enemy stun effects for this skill's duration. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

238_6.name: Yasaka Magatama
238_6._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Hashirama's Cells' is active, then this skill will first make the enemy ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

238_7.name: Nativity of a World of Trees
238_7._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time, Edo Tensei Madara's allies will ignore energy drain or removal effects. If 'Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan' is active, Edo Tensei Madara will also gain 1 red energy and then will be healed for 10 health each turn for 4 turns. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

239_0.name: Kamui Dimension
239_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill is considered a stun, energy drain and invulnerability skill.

239_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Kamui Dimension' and 'Wood Release: Roots' will also deal 10 affliction damage to their targets if used. This skill is considered a stun, energy drain and invulnerability skill.

239_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Obito (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Uchiha Obito (S)'s other skills will also make him invulnerable for 1 turn.

240_0.name: Scorching Armored Fist
240_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Roshi deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. For 2 turns, this enemy's affliction skills will be stunned. This skill stacks.

240_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn their affliction-only skills will deal 10 less damage and if they use a new skill, they will permanently take 5 additional damage from 'Scorching Armored Fist'. This effect stacks.

240_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Roshi invulnerable for 1 turn.

241_0.name: Erupting Strong Foot
241_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Han deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's counter effects will last 1 turn less. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

241_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Han deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes them ignore all helpful counters and reflects on them for 1 turn. 'Erupting Strong Foot' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

241_3.name: Defensive Tail Apparition
241_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Han invulnerable for 1 turn.

241_4.name: Horn Breaking
241_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Han deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, the counter effects of their skills will last 2 turns less. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

242_0.name: Body Coating
242_0._originalDescription: Black Zetsu targets one enemy until Black Zetsu himself dies. Everytime that enemy uses a new skill, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn and the skill they used will replace 'Body Coating' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

242_1.name: Wood Release: Emerging Forest
242_1._originalDescription: Black Zetsu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

242_2.name: Event Recording
242_2._originalDescription: Black Zetsu targets himself and his allies. For 1 turn, they will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible.

242_3.name: Mayfly
242_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Black Zetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

243_0.name: Explosive Bubble
243_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Utakata deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy, who will then take 5 piercing damage for the following 3 turns. During this time, everytime this enemy uses a new skill, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

243_1.name: Leech Gap
243_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Utakata targets one enemy, stealing 15 health from them each turn for 2 turns. During this time*, 'Speed Dodge' will last 2 turns instead if used. For 1 turn, the target enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

243_2.name: Saiken Awakening
243_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Utakata makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 4 turns. 243_3.name: Speed Dodge
243_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Utakata invulnerable for 1 turn.

265_1._originalDescription: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them and then applies 'Long-Range Distortion' (except its apply effect) on them.

265_2.name: Long-Range Distortion
265_2._originalDescription: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) reduces one enemy's non-affliction damage by 15 for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to them and then applies 'Double Shadow Shuriken' (except its apply effect) on them.

265_3.name: Shadow Snake Hands Rescue
265_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

266_0.name: Implanted Rinnegan
266_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Limbo: Limited Border Jail'.

266_1.name: Restrain, Absorb and Synchronise
266_1._originalDescription: Regenerated Madara stuns one enemy's harmful skills for 1 turn and steals 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, if they use a new strategic skill, this skill will be replaced by it for 1 turn.

266_2.name: Emergency Susanoo Ribcage
266_2._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new non-strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and will gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Demonic Statue Chains'.

266_3.name: High Endurance
266_3._originalDescription: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and ignores all harmful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn.

266_4.name: Limbo: Limited Border Jail
266_4._originalDescription: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and deals 10 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, their harmful skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

266_5.name: Demonic Statue Chains
266_5._originalDescription: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently, deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and increases the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn.

267_0.name: Wood Release: Major Cutting
267_0._originalDescription: Juubi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies for 1 turn and gains 30 points of destructible defense also for 1 turn. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

267_1.name: Ten-Tails Fission
267_1._originalDescription: Juubi heals its team for 10 health for 1 turn and grants them 10 points of damage reduction also for 1 turn. During this time Juubi's team will ignore energy drain or removal effects. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

267_2.name: God Tree's Tailed-Beast Bomb
267_2._originalDescription: Juubi targets one enemy for 1 turn. Once this skill's duration is over, this enemy will take 50 affliction damage. This skill cannot be used while active, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

267_3.name: Constant Evolution
267_3._originalDescription: Juubi removes all harmful skills from itself and then targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new skill, Juubi's skills will last 1 additional turn for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Tenpenchii' permanently after used, cannot be countered or reflected and ignores invulnerability.

267_4.name: Tenpenchii
267_4._originalDescription: Juubi deals 40 affliction damage to all characters. This skill's duration isn't increased by 'Constant Evolution'.

268_0.name: Cursed Seal of Heaven: Enhance
268_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' will grant Mitarashi Anko (S) 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

268_1.name: Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands
268_1._originalDescription: Mitarashi Anko (S) deals 5 damage and 15 affliction damage* to one enemy. This affliction damage cannot be ignored. For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

268_2.name: Physical Pull In
268_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will counter the first new harmful skill used on her and the countered enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, if used, 'Cursed Seal of Heaven: Enhance' will also make Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn and increase the damage of 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' by 5 permanently. This skill is invisible.

268_3.name: Tactical Low-Ground Hiding
268_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

269_0.name: Izanami
269_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, Uchiha Naori can use 'Mind Disrupture'. During this time, whenever an enemy uses a new non-physical skill on her, 'Mind Disrupture' will be applied on them. This skill will be replaced by 'Redemption' permanently.

269_1.name: Mind Disrupture
269_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Naori deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional white energy. This skill requires 'Izanami' to be active.

269_2.name: Quick Sword Slash
269_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Naori deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn.

269_3.name: Replacement Technique
269_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Naori invulnerable for 1 turn.

269_4.name: Redemption
269_4._originalDescription: Uchiha Naori targets one enemy, permanently changing the cost of their non-strategic skills to 2 white energies. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and ends if Uchiha Naori dies.

270_0.name: Water Release: Water Stream
270_0._originalDescription: Ruka deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 piercing damage.

270_1.name: Water Release: Water Wall
270_1._originalDescription: Ruka will counter the next enemy that uses a new non-mental skill on her and will then make this skill unusable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active. This skill will end if 'Water Release: Burning Bath' is used.

270_2.name: Water Release: Water Field
270_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy. During this time, they will take 10 additional damage from 'Water Release: Water Stream' and this skill will be replaced by 'Water Release: Burning Bath'.

270_3.name: Clever Hideout
270_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

270_4.name: Water Release: Burning Bath
270_4._originalDescription: Permanently, one enemy takes 20 piercing damage each turn and is stunned. Ruka takes 10 affliction damage* each turn during this time. This skill ignores invulnerability and will end if either character dies or if Ruka uses a new skill.

271_0.name: Truth-Seeking Umbrella
271_0._originalDescription: Rikudou Obito deals 0 damage to one enemy plus 15 damage for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Orbs' permanently after used.

271_1.name: Sword of Nunoboko
271_1._originalDescription: Rikudou Obito deals 25 damage to one enemy and then stuns their energy, affliction and strategic skills for 0 turns plus 1 turn for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has. Any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards.

271_2.name: Minor Six Red Yang Formation
271_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, all enemies' damage will be reduced by 5. For 1 turn, any skill Rikudou Obito uses will not remove any 'Black Chakra Stack'. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

271_3.name: Truth-Seeking Shield
271_3._originalDescription: Rikudou Obito gains 0 points of permanent destructible defense plus 20 points of permanent destructible defense for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Black Receiver' permanently after used.

271_4.name: Truth-Seeking Orbs
271_4._originalDescription: Rikudou Obito deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 0 plus 10 for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has and then any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Umbrella' permanently after used.

271_5.name: Truth-Seeking Black Receiver
271_5._originalDescription: Rikudou Obito gains 0 random energies plus 1 random energy for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Shield' permanently after used and removes all of its destructible defense.

271_6.name: Black Chakra Stack
271_6._originalDescription: This is a 'Black Chakra Stack'. All of Rikudou Obito's skills grant him 1 'Black Chakra Stack' normally, 2 if his health is at 50 or below and 3 if his health is at 25 or below (after their other effects are applied).

272_0.name: Limbo: Border Jail
272_0._originalDescription: Rikudou Madara targets himself or an ally, making them ignore all harmful non-affliction damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and can only be used 4 times.

272_1.name: Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch
272_1._originalDescription: Rikudou Madara deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any enemy who targets any of Rikudou Madara's allies with a new skill will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This skill stacks and ends when Rikudou Madara dies.

272_2.name: Six Paths Ten-Tails Coffin Seal
272_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, the first new non-affliction damage skill used on Rikudou Madara will deal no damage to him and the damage of 'Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch' will be increased by the amount of original damage of that skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

272_3.name: Infinite Tsukuyomi
272_3._originalDescription: Rikudou Madara targets all enemies until they use a new skill. Their skills will cost 1 additional random energy, will deal 15 less damage and once they use a new skill, they will take 15 piercing damage. This skill cannot be used on enemies already affected by it and cannot be reflected.

273_0.name: Bone-Breaking Punch
273_0._originalDescription: Maito Dai deals 10 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use and ignores invulnerability.

273_1.name: Air-Throwing Punch
273_1._originalDescription: Maito Dai deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 less damage with each use and ignores invulnerability.

273_2.name: Eight Inner Gates
273_2._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, Maito Dai's skills will deal 10 additional damage and everytime he uses a new skill, he will take 10 affliction damage*. This skill stacks.

273_3.name: Defensive Surveillance
273_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Maito Dai invulnerable for 1 turn.

274_0.name: Ally-to-Ally Combat
274_0._originalDescription: Karui makes her team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Cloud-Style Front Beheading' will deal 15 additional damage and 'Call to Action' will target Karui's entire team instead and its values will be reduced by 10.

274_1.name: Cloud-Style Front Beheading
274_1._originalDescription: Karui deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy's skills that directly grant destructible defense will grant 10 less points of destructible defense. This skill stacks.

274_2.name: Call to Action
274_2._originalDescription: Karui targets herself or an ally for 3 turns. During this time, any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will take 20 piercing damage and 20 additional damage from 'Cloud-Style Front Beheading' for 1 turn. This skill ends if Karui dies.

274_3.name: Clashing Parry
274_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Karui invulnerable for 1 turn.

275_0.name: Data Analysis
275_0._originalDescription: Mabui targets one ally. For 3 turns, that ally's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it.

275_1.name: Heavenly Transfer Technique
275_1._originalDescription: Mabui targets both teams for 4 turns. During this time, her team will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1 turn, while the enemy team will have the cooldown of their skills increased by 1 turn.

275_2.name: Ethereal Transmission Technique
275_2._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on ally. If used on an enemy, they will take 25 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns. If used on an ally, they will take 15 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be decreased by 2 turns.

275_3.name: Intense Focus
275_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mabui invulnerable for 1 turn.

276_0.name: Eight Gates Released Formation
276_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, Eighth Gate Gai can use his other skills. During this time, he will have 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction, will take 10 affliction damage* each turn and will ignore enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects. This skill cannot be removed and will be permanently replaced by 'Steam of Blood' after used.

276_1.name: Space-Shattering Punch
276_1._originalDescription: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 30 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

276_2.name: Evening Elephant
276_2._originalDescription: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 60 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

276_3.name: Eighth Gate Speed
276_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Eighth Gate Gai invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times and requires 'Eight Gates Released Formation' to be active.

276_4.name: Steam of Blood
276_4._originalDescription: Eighth Gate Gai heals himself for 30 health. After 3 uses, this skill will be permanently replaced by 'Night Gai'. This skill cannot be removed.

276_5.name: Night Gai
276_5._originalDescription: Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 500 damage to them. Eighth Gate Gai will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

277_0.name: Perfect Susanoo Armor
277_0._originalDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense. While Dual Mangekyou Kakashi still has destructible defense from this skill, 'Susanoo's Shared Shield' may be used and 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' will be replaced by 'Kamui Shuriken'.

277_1.name: Susanoo's Shared Shield
277_1._originalDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi grants his allies 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead make them invulnerable for 1 turn but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi. This skill requires 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' to be active.

277_2.name: Kamui Lightning Cutter
277_2._originalDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them and makes them invulnerable to harmful and helpful skills for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead deal 45 piercing damage but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

277_3.name: Intangibility
277_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Dual Mangekyou Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

277_4.name: Kamui Shuriken
277_4._originalDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead reduce the enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 permanently but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

278_0.name: Neutralising Destruction Insect
278_0._originalDescription: Aburame Muta deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any new skill used by that enemy will have 1 turn of additional cooldown. This effect stacks. This skill deals 5 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.

278_1.name: Insect Barricade
278_1._originalDescription: Aburame Muta deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, Aburame Muta's skills will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn. This skill deals 10 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.

278_2.name: Insect Jamming Technique
278_2._originalDescription: Aburame Muta makes the non-conditional stun effects of all allies' skills they use this turn last 1 additional turn. For 1 turn, Aburame Muta and all allies will ignore enemy stun effects.

278_3.name: Quick Retreat
278_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Aburame Muta invulnerable for 1 turn.

279_0.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Assault
279_0._originalDescription: Chiriku deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

279_1.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Protection
279_1._originalDescription: Chiriku gains 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy who uses a new non-mental skill on him will be dealt 15 damage. This skill is invisible.

279_2.name: Thousand-Armed Murder Counter
279_2._originalDescription: Chiriku targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. All harmful skills used on them will be countered and the countered enemies will take 40 damage. This skill is invisible.

279_3.name: Kannon Spirit
279_3._originalDescription: Chiriku heals himself for 20 health and then gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time 'Thousand-Armed Murder Assault' will deal 10 additional damage and Chiriku's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown.

280_0.name: Hidden Mist Technique
280_0._originalDescription: Biwa Juuzou targets all enemies, removing all active control skills on them. For 1 turn, their invulnerability skills will last 1 turn less. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 white energy instead.

280_1.name: Executioner's Blade: Blood Absorption
280_1._originalDescription: Biwa Juuzou steals 15 health from one enemy and makes his team ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 red energy instead.

280_2.name: Executioner's Blade Charge
280_2._originalDescription: Biwa Juuzou deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 green energy instead.

280_3.name: Water Clone Replacement
280_3._originalDescription: Biwa Juuzou gains 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, all his other skills will be replaced by 'Executioner's Blade Execution'. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill is invisible.

280_4.name: Executioner's Blade Execution
280_4._originalDescription: Biwa Juuzou targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is at 85 or less, they will be instantly killed.

281_0.name: Mangekyou Sharingan Enhance
281_0._originalDescription: Rehabilitated Obito takes 10 affliction damage*. For the rest of the game, his skills will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

281_1.name: Dimensional Assault
281_1._originalDescription: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage and 10 piercing damage to one enemy and makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will also stun its target for 1 turn.

281_2.name: Dimensional Rush
281_2._originalDescription: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, their stun skills will last 1 turn less* and their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy*. This skill cannot be countered.

281_3.name: Space-Time Portal
281_3._originalDescription: Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if Rehabilitated Obito is targeted by a new harmful non-affliction skill, he will become invulnerable for the rest of that turn*.

282_0.name: Amenominaka: Lava
282_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, all enemies will take 5 affliction damage whenever they use a new skill.
