During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also stun their targets' affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

282_1.name: Amenominaka: Ice
282_1._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, all enemies' stun effects will last 1 turn less. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also ignore invulnerability. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

282_2.name: Amenominaka: Mountains
282_2._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, all enemies will deal 5 less energy damage. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also decrease their targets' physical damage by 10 for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

282_3.name: Amenominaka: Sand
282_3._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, all enemies will ignore friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also first destroy their targets' destructible defense. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

282_4.name: All-Killing Ash Bones
282_4._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy, kills them if their health drops to 10 or below and marks them permanently. If this skill is used on a marked enemy, they will be killed if their health drops to 20 or below instead.

282_5.name: Rabbit Hair Needle
282_5._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants her team 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

282_6.name: Eighty Gods Vacuum Attack
282_6._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Expansive Truth-Seeking Ball' for 1 turn after used.

282_7.name: Yomotsu Hirasaka
282_7._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya removes all skills from herself and then targets all enemies, removing any Ootsutsuki Kaguya's dimension from them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

282_8.name: Expansive Truth-Seeking Ball
282_8._originalDescription: After 3 turns of this skill being used, Ootsutsuki Kaguya's health will be set to 100 (this is a healing effect). During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya will deal 60 damage to the first enemy who uses a new skill on her. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Ootsutsuki Kaguya. This skill will be replaced by 'Major Summoning: Juubi' for 3 turns after used.

282_9.name: Major Summoning: Juubi
282_9._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health and replacing all their skills with Juubi's skills permanently.

283_0.name: Six Paths Taijutsu
283_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hamura deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill cannot be countered.

283_1.name: Six Paths Projection Spectrum
283_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hamura gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

283_2.name: Six Paths Yin Power
283_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hamura targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's 'Six Paths Yang Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

283_3.name: Six Paths Byakugan Sight
283_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hamura targets all enemies, who will deal 15 less damage for 1 turn and if they use a new strategic skill, they will deal 5 less damage permanently. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Hamura dies.

283_4.name: Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei
283_4._originalDescription: The character affected by this skill is stunned for 3 turns, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

284_0.name: Drilling Hand of Sage Lightning
284_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo removes all helpful non-strategic skills from one enemy and deals 10 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

284_1.name: Six Paths Susanoo Assault
284_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo deals 20 damage to one enemy and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

284_2.name: Six Paths Yang Power
284_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hamura's 'Six Paths Yin Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

284_3.name: Secret Treasure of the Toads
284_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo heals one ally for 20 health each turn for 2 turns and during this time, this ally will ignore enemy stun effects and will be unable to be killed. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

284_4.name: Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei
284_4._originalDescription: The character affected by this skill is stunned for 3 turns, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

285_0.name: Senbon Spit
285_0._originalDescription: Shiranui Genma deals 5 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used, 'Double Kunai Cut' will deal 20 damage instantly instead and grant 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn instead.

285_1.name: Double Kunai Cut
285_1._originalDescription: Shiranui Genma deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. Namiashi Raidou's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. For 2 turns, Shiranui Genma will have 10 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.

285_2.name: Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation
285_2._originalDescription: Shiranui Genma targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Namiashi Raidou's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.

285_3.name: Elite Speed
285_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Shiranui Genma invulnerable for 1 turn.

286_0.name: Silent Approach
286_0._originalDescription: Namiashi Raidou targets one enemy, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. During this time, 'Kokutou Stab' will deal 15 additional damage to them and will reduce their non-affliction damage by 10 additional points. This skill is invisible.

286_1.name: Kokutou Stab
286_1._originalDescription: Namiashi Raidou deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. Shiranui Genma's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. This skill stacks.

286_2.name: Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation
286_2._originalDescription: Namiashi Raidou targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Shiranui Genma's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.

286_3.name: Flee
286_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Namiashi Raidou invulnerable for 1 turn.

287_0.name: Silver Wheel Explosion
287_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will deal 20 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

287_1.name: Golden Wheel Explosion
287_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will ignore healing effects and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

287_2.name: Localised Explosion
287_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, 'Truth-Seeking Dome' will cost 1 less random energy permanently. This effect stacks. The following turn, this enemy will take 10 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

287_3.name: Truth-Seeking Dome
287_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Toneri makes his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

288_0.name: Zori's Iaidou
288_0._originalDescription: Zori and Waraji deal 10 piercing damage to one enemy and gain 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

288_1.name: Waraji's Iaidou
288_1._originalDescription: Zori and Waraji deal 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun effects of any new skill this enemy uses will take no effect.

288_2.name: Hostage
288_2._originalDescription: Zori and Waraji target one enemy, reducing their physical and energy damage by 15 for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, the damage 'Zori's Iaidou' and 'Waraji's Iaidou' deal to this enemy will be increased by 10. This skill stacks and ends if Zori and Waraji die.

288_3.name: Swordsman Reflexes
288_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Zori and Waraji invulnerable for 1 turn.

289_0.name: Naruto Region Combo
289_0._originalDescription: Rikudou Naruto gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and targets one enemy, reducing that enemy's non-affliction damage by 20 for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead make Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn, stun one target enemy for 1 turn and reduce that enemy's damage by 10 permanently (if used). This skill stacks.

289_1.name: Regeneration Ability
289_1._originalDescription: Rikudou Naruto targets one ally, removing all harmful non-strategic skills from them and then healing them for 20 health. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and will instead remove all harmful non-strategic skills from one ally and heal them for 40 health (if used).

289_2.name: Sage Art: Super Tailed-Beast Rasenshuriken
289_2._originalDescription: Rikudou Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and increases the cost of their non-strategic skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will target all enemies instead (if used).

289_3.name: Six Paths: Kurama Awakening
289_3._originalDescription: All of Rikudou Naruto's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used in the game.

289_4.name: Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage
289_4._originalDescription: Rikudou Naruto deals 30 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, 'Yang Chakra Gathering' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

289_5.name: Yang Chakra Gathering
289_5._originalDescription: After 2 turns of this skill being used, Rikudou Naruto will heal himself for 35 health and will gain 2 random energies. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

289_6.name: Six Paths: Ultra-Big Ball Rasenshuriken
289_6._originalDescription: Rikudou Naruto removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rikudou Naruto will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

289_7.name: Chakra Tail Shield
289_7._originalDescription: This skill makes Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Yang Chakra Gathering' will cost 1 less random energy.

290_0.name: Rinnegan Illusion
290_0._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke stuns one enemy's non-mental skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead last 2 turns (if used).

290_1.name: Blaze Release: Honoikazuchi
290_1._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, they will take another 10 affliction damage. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and it will instead instantly deal 25 affliction damage to all enemies (if used).

290_2.name: Onyx Chidori
290_2._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will deal 30 additional damage (if used).

290_3.name: Six Paths: Yin Power Susanoo
290_3._originalDescription: All of Rinnegan Sasuke's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used in the game.

290_4.name: Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique
290_4._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and 15 affliction damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, any enemy that target Rinnegan Sasuke with a new skill will take 5 additional damage from 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' permanently. For 1 turn, 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

290_5.name: Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation
290_5._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 15 affliction damage* to his allies and then increases his damage by 15 permanently. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

290_6.name: Indra's Arrow
290_6._originalDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rinnegan Sasuke will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

290_7.name: Susanoo: Body Cocoon
290_7._originalDescription: This skill makes Rinnegan Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' will cost 1 less random energy.

291_0.name: Amenomihashira
291_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 10 piercing damage twice to them. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 5 additional damage. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional blue energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself.

291_1.name: True Several Thousand Hands
291_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura grants his team 30 points of destructible defense for 3 turns and during this time, every original non-affliction damage dealt to his allies will be capped at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional red energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself. For 3 turns this skill will be replaced by 'Top Transformed Buddha'.

291_2.name: Six Paths: Kunitsukami
291_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura gains 25 points of permanent destructible defense and an additional 25 for every other skill of his he has active on him. During 'Amenomihashira', this skill will grant him 2 random energies. During 'True Several Thousand Hands', this skill will make him ignore enemy stun effects permanently. During 'Top Transformed Buddha', this skill will permanently cap every original non-affliction damage dealt to him at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

291_3.name: Swift Wind Wall
291_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Ashura invulnerable for 1 turn.

291_4.name: Top Transformed Buddha
291_4._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional green energy. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself.

292_0.name: Lightning Release: Lightning Spear
292_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 3 turns. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Blade'.

292_1.name: Lightning Release: Lightning Ball
292_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Lightning Release: Lightning Spear' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Dual Blades'.

292_2.name: Origin: Susanoo
292_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra takes 15 affliction damage* and then becomes invulnerable to physical skills permanently. During this time, he will ignore healing effects, take 5 affliction damage each turn* and everytime he uses a new skill, he will take another 10 affliction damage*. This skill can be used while active for no cost to cancel itself.

292_3.name: Hinokagutsuchi
292_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra targets himself or an ally for 1 turn, countering the first non-mental harmful skill used on them and dealing 10 affliction damage to the countered enemy. If 'Origin: Susanoo' is active, this skill will deal 30 affliction damage instead. This skill is invisible.

292_4.name: Origin Blade
292_4._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 30 piercing damage to them. If that enemy's health drops to 5 or below, they will be instantly killed.

292_5.name: Origin Dual Blades
292_5._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Origin Blade' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

293_0.name: Sword Slash
293_0._originalDescription: Mahiru deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces their physical damage by 5 permanently. This skill deals 5 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Shadow Clone Assault', does not stack and will re-apply itself.

293_1.name: Shadow Clone Assault
293_1._originalDescription: Mahiru deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces their energy damage by 5 permanently. This skill deals 5 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sword Slash', does not stack and will re-apply itself.

293_2.name: Earth Release: Underground Projection Fish
293_2._originalDescription: Mahiru deals 0 piercing damage to one enemy and then becomes invulnerable for 2 turns. If the enemy is affected by either 'Sword Slash' or 'Shadow Clone Assault', this skill will deal 25 piercing damage instead. If they are affected by both, this skill will deal 50 piercing damage instead.

293_3.name: Swift Dodge
293_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mahiru invulnerable for 1 turn.

294_0.name: Precise Kunai Strike
294_0._originalDescription: Taiseki deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage.

294_1.name: Hostage Capture
294_1._originalDescription: Taiseki targets one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will ignore all friendly destructible defense and healing effects. If they use a new skill during this time, they will be countered. If successfully countered, their non-strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn, Taiseki will gain 1 random energy and this skill will end.

294_2.name: Hiding with Camouflage Technique
294_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Taiseki will ignore enemy stun effects and 'Precise Kunai Strike' and 'Hostage Capture' will be invisible if used. This skill is invisible.

294_3.name: Smokescreen Escape
294_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Taiseki invulnerable for 1 turn.

295_0.name: Retractable Blade Assault
295_0._originalDescription: Kakkou targets all enemies. The main target will take 30 piercing damage and any enemy affected by 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will take 10 piercing damage.

295_1.name: Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction
295_1._originalDescription: Kakkou deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks. If any enemy has 'Interrogation Genjutsu' active on them, 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will be applied again on them.

295_2.name: Interrogation Genjutsu
295_2._originalDescription: Kakkou targets one enemy, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill will be unable to be used on that enemy.

295_3.name: Retractable Blade Deflection
295_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kakkou invulnerable for 1 turn.

296_0.name: Mangekyou Sharingan: Mental Breakdown
296_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 damage to all enemies and then reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

296_1.name: Fire Release: Great Fireball
296_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and then reduces the duration of their stun and counter effects by 1 turn for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

296_2.name: Military Coordination
296_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Fugaku targets his team for 3 turns. During this time, all effects of 'Mangekyou Sharingan: Mental Breakdown' and 'Fire Release: Great Fireball' will be concentrated on one enemy instead and everytime a member of Uchiha Fugaku's team is targeted by a new harmful skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same class as the skill that was used on them (only main classes considered).

296_3.name: Thoughtful Analysis
296_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Fugaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

297_0.name: Lightning Transmission
297_0._originalDescription: Commander Kakashi targets all enemies and all allies for 2 turns. During this time, his allies will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills and enemies who use a new harmful skill will take 5 piercing damage.

297_1.name: Executioner's Blade Assault
297_1._originalDescription: Commander Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will steal 20 health from one enemy instead.

297_2.name: Lightning-Infused Kunai
297_2._originalDescription: Commander Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, that enemy will take 5 piercing damage each turn, will deal 5 less damage with physical and energy skills, the stun effects of their skills will last 1 turn less and their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 random energy less. This skill stacks.

297_3.name: Executioner's Blade: Defensive Maneuver
297_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Commander Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

298_0.name: Chained Shuriken Assault
298_0._originalDescription: Shin Clone deals 15 damage to one enemy, who will take 10 damage the following turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 additional damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

298_1.name: One-Hand Shuriken Stab
298_1._originalDescription: Shin Clone deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 10 or below. For 1 turn, Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

298_2.name: Clone Sacrifice
298_2._originalDescription: Shin Clone makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 less damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.

298_3.name: Chain Deflection
298_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Shin Clone invulnerable for 1 turn.

298_4.name: Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan
298_4._originalDescription: If Shin Clone uses the same skill 5 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': All skills are removed from Shin Clone. For the rest of the game, any enemy who targets Shin Clone with a new skill will take 25 piercing damage.

299_0.name: Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage
299_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Shin deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and mental skills for 1 turn. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

299_1.name: Object Manipulation: Bladed Shuriken
299_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Shin deals 45 damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical and mental skills for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. For 1 turn 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will have no cooldown.

299_2.name: Object Manipulation Mark
299_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Shin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if that enemy uses a new skill, they will permanently take 5 additional damage from Uchiha Shin's skills and be stunned for 1 additional turn by them. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill stacks.

299_3.name: Space-Time Doujutsu
299_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Shin invulnerable for 1 turn.

299_4.name: Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan
299_4._originalDescription: If Uchiha Shin uses 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' twice in a row, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': For the rest of the game, 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 15 health and 'Object Manipulation: Bladed Shuriken' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 45 health.

300_0.name: Tool Cover
300_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful physical or energy skills used on them for 1 turn. The target will gain 1 random energy for each skill countered this way. This skill is invisible.

300_1.name: Oodachi Mow Down
300_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then targets one random member of his team. For 1 turn, this character will gain 1 random energy for every new harmful physical or energy skill used on them. This skill is invisible.

300_2.name: Ground Smash
300_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 15 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will instead deal 30 damage to one enemy and grant Ootsutsuki Kinshiki 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

300_3.name: Ootsutsuki Flight
300_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Kinshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

300_4.name: Achievement: Tool Barrage
300_4._originalDescription: If Ootsutsuki Kinshiki uses 'Tool Cover' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Tool Barrage': 'Tool Cover' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, 'Oodachi Mow Down' will target all enemies and all members of Ootsutsuki Kinshiki's team instead.

301_0.name: Chakra Extraction
301_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki deals 25 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional random energy and will deal 20 additional damage.

301_1.name: Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb
301_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful energy skills used on them for 1 turn. After 3 uses of this skill, it can no longer be used and 'Reign of the High Emperor: Release' will be able to be used. This skill is invisible.

301_2.name: Reign of the High Emperor: Release
301_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 75 damage to them. 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' can now be used again. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 3 uses of 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' so it can be used.

301_3.name: Karma: Momoshiki
301_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one ally permanently. If their health drops to 10 or below while Ootsutsuki Momoshiki is dead, that ally will be healed for 90 health, will have all helpful and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced by Ootsutsuki Momoshiki's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

301_4.name: Achievement: Chakra Fruit
301_4._originalDescription: If Ootsutsuki Momoshiki uses 'Chakra Extraction' 5 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra Fruit': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 100 health. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Chakra Fruit Momoshiki's skills.

302_0.name: Hair Binding Technique
302_0._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns this enemy's physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

302_1.name: Dog Raising Robust Lord
302_1._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki targets all enemies for 3 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, they will take 20 damage. If they use a new harmful skill during this time, they will take 25 damage and this skill will end on them.

302_2.name: Monkey Rock
302_2._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki removes all harmful skills from his team. He will gain 45 points of permanent destructible defense and his allies will gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense.

302_3.name: Flawless Interception
302_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Chakra Fruit Momoshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

302_4.name: Achievement: Triggered Rage
302_4._originalDescription: If Chakra Fruit Momoshiki uses 'Hair Binding Technique', 'Dog Raising Robust Lord' and 'Monkey Rock' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Triggered Rage': For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on him, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from damaging skills for 1 turn.

303_0.name: Shinobi-Ware: Slicer
303_0._originalDescription: Kawaki deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, this enemy will take 5 piercing damage if they use a new skill that directly grants damage reduction or destructible defense. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill or if it's removed from Kawaki or the affected enemy.

303_1.name: Shinobi-Ware: Bullets
303_1._originalDescription: Kawaki deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 piercing damage each following turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill* or if it's removed from Kawaki or any of the affected enemies.

303_2.name: Shinobi-Ware: Monster Hand
303_2._originalDescription: Kawaki will gain 25 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill.

303_3.name: Enhanced Agility
303_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn.

303_4.name: Achievement: Karma
303_4._originalDescription: If Kawaki uses any skill while having 10 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Karma': All of Kawaki's skills are removed from him. He will be unable to be killed for 3 turns. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Karma Kawaki's skills.

304_0.name: Karma-Enhanced Shinobi-Ware
304_0._originalDescription: Karma Kawaki deals 25 damage and 25 piercing damage to one enemy. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also deal an additional 25 affliction damage* to the enemy.

304_1.name: Karma Palm Thrust
304_1._originalDescription: Karma Kawaki destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them, stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove 2 random energies from the enemy.

304_2.name: Karma: Energy Relocation
304_2._originalDescription: Karma Kawaki becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction-only skills for 3 turns. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also grant him 2 random energies instantly.

304_3.name: Karma Absorption
304_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Karma Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove all harmful skills from him.

304_4.name: Achievement: Recharge
304_4._originalDescription: If Karma Kawaki uses 'Karma-Enhanced Shinobi-Ware' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Recharge': His health is set to 15 and he gains 60 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will have no cooldown.

305_0.name: Manipulating Attack Blades
305_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, Yashamaru will gain 5 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. Every turn, the damage of 'Silent Murder' will be permanently increased by 5. This effect stacks. This skill cannot be used while active.

305_1.name: Silent Murder
305_1._originalDescription: Yashamaru deals 5 piercing damage to one enemy.

305_2.name: Heavenly Punishment
305_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, if Yashamaru dies, all enemies will be dealt 25 affliction damage instantly. This skill is invisible.

305_3.name: Killer Disguise
305_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yashamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

306_0.name: Frontline Position
306_0._originalDescription: Samui makes one ally invulnerable for 3 turns. During this time, she will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and 'Battle Cry' will last 1 additional turn. This skill ends if Samui dies.

306_1.name: Tanto Combat
306_1._originalDescription: Samui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If Samui's health is at 60 or below, this skill will deal another 25 piercing damage to its target.

306_2.name: Battle Cry
306_2._originalDescription: Samui targets her team, granting them lifelink for 1 turn.

306_3.name: Tanto Guard
306_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Samui invulnerable for 1 turn.

307_0.name: Samurai Assemble
307_0._originalDescription: For 1 turn, 'Flash Iaidou' will target all enemies if used and 'Ally Saving' will target all allies if used. Also for 1 turn, every enemy who uses a new skill on Samurai Troops will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns.

307_1.name: Flash Iaidou
307_1._originalDescription: Samurai Troops deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy. On this skill's 1st and 2nd uses, the enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. On its 3rd and 4th uses, the enemy will ignore healing effects and be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. On its 5th and 6th uses, the enemy's strategic skills will be stunned for 2 turns.

307_2.name: Ally Saving
307_2._originalDescription: Samurai Troops target one ally, making them unable to be killed for 2 turns. This skill ends if Samurai Troops die.

307_3.name: Blade Defense
307_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Samurai Troops invulnerable for 1 turn.

308_0.name: Lava Release: Rasenshuriken
308_0._originalDescription: Hokage Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 15 affliction damage*.

308_1.name: Nine-Tails Fire Fists
308_1._originalDescription: Hokage Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns, increasing the cost of that enemy's non-strategic skills by 1 random energy during this time.

308_2.name: Kurama Laser Beam
308_2._originalDescription: Hokage Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Hokage Naruto will ignore enemy stun effects.

308_3.name: Chakra Arms Wall
308_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hokage Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

308_4.name: Achievement: Kurama Chakra Spirit
308_4._originalDescription: If Hokage Naruto uses 'Kurama Laser Beam' while having 40 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Kurama Chakra Spirit': He is healed for 20 health. For 4 turns, the specific costs on his skills will be random costs instead.

309_0.name: Amenotejikara
309_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Sasuke (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, all new harmful physical, energy or affliction skills that target Uchiha Sasuke (B) will be reflected to that enemy. This skill is invisible.

309_1.name: Space-Time Amaterasu
309_1._originalDescription: Uchiha Sasuke (B) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 10 affliction damage each following turn permanently. For 2 turns, every enemy who uses a new non-mental skill on Uchiha Sasuke (B) will be dealt 10 affliction damage. This skill stacks and ends if Uchiha Sasuke (B) dies.

309_2.name: Susanoo Mountain Destroyer
309_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Sasuke (B) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and then grants his allies 35 points of destructible defense for 2 turns. This skill ignores invulnerability.

309_3.name: Space-Time Portal Escape
309_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

309_4.name: Achievement: Rinnegan
309_4._originalDescription: If Uchiha Sasuke (B) uses 'Susanoo Mountain Destroyer' while having 40 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Rinnegan': He is healed for 20 health. For 4 turns, the specific costs on his skills will be random costs instead.

310_0.name: Fire Release: Blazing Meteors
310_0._originalDescription: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

310_1.name: Adamantine Seal: Monkey Yang Suppression
310_1._originalDescription: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) stuns one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

310_2.name: Mature Rasengan
310_2._originalDescription: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

310_3.name: Summoning: Gamagorou
310_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

310_4.name: Achievement: Sealing Release
310_4._originalDescription: If Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) uses 'Fire Release: Blazing Meteors', 'Adamantine Seal: Monkey Yang Suppression' and 'Mature Rasengan' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sealing Release': All harmful skills are removed from him. For the rest of the game, he will ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

311_0.name: Lightning Release: Spider Web
311_0._originalDescription: Motoi deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 10 piercing damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, 'Minor Discharge' can be used on them.

311_1.name: Minor Discharge
311_1._originalDescription: Motoi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies affected by 'Lightning Release: Spider Web'. For the rest of the game, their physical and energy damage will be reduced by 5 and everytime they use a new skill, that skill's cooldown will be increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks.

311_2.name: Summoning: Fukuemon
311_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, the counter effects of all enemies' new skills will last 1 turn less. For 2 turns, Motoi's team will have 5 points of damage reduction.

311_3.name: Clever Hideout
311_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Motoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

312_0.name: Armor of Venom
312_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 1 random energy to apply 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.

312_1.name: Jar of Poison
312_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies and gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 2 random energies to apply 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.

312_2.name: Poison Cloud
312_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Torune targets all enemies, removing 1 random energy from them for each Venom Beetle on them.

312_3.name: Super Leap
312_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

312_4.name: Venom Beetle
312_4._originalDescription: This skill deals 5 affliction damage to the target for 4 turns.

313_0.name: Sand Whirlwind
313_0._originalDescription: Kazekage Gaara (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Desert: Hand' will also remove all helpful strategic skills from its target. This skill ends if Kazekage Gaara (B) dies.

313_1.name: Desert: Hand
313_1._originalDescription: Kazekage Gaara (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the stun effect of 'Sand Whirlwind' will last 2 turns instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

313_2.name: Air Sand Protective Wall
313_2._originalDescription: Kazekage Gaara (B) grants his team 10 points of damage reduction, 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

313_3.name: Sand Clone
313_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kazekage Gaara (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

313_4.name: Achievement: Sand Mesh
313_4._originalDescription: If Kazekage Gaara (B) uses 'Air Sand Protective Wall' while having 60 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sand Mesh': For the rest of the game, 'Air Sand Protective Wall' will grant his team 30 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn instead of doing its other effects (it will still be invisible).

314_0.name: Chakra-Covered Hiramekarei Assault
314_0._originalDescription: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, they will take 10 additional damage from non-physical skills. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

314_1.name: Water Release: Great Waterfall
314_1._originalDescription: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, they will be invulnerable to friendly skills. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

314_2.name: Bloody Mist Sword Art: Bone Mutilation
314_2._originalDescription: Mizukage Chojuro deals 10 damage to one enemy each turn permanently. During this time, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. This skill stacks and ends when the target enemy uses a new skill.

314_3.name: Hiramekarei Shelter
314_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mizukage Chojuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

314_4.name: Achievement: Water Drill
314_4._originalDescription: If Mizukage Chojuro uses any of his harmful skills and then uses 'Hiramekarei Shelter' the turn right after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Water Drill': For 3 turns, he will have 10 points of damage reduction.

315_0.name: Lava Release: Lava Fist
315_0._originalDescription: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi destroys one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 15 damage to them. If used on an enemy affected by 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal', that enemy will take 10 additional damage from this skill and will also be stunned for 1 turn.

315_1.name: Lava Release: Lava Wave
315_1._originalDescription: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi deals 30 damage to one enemy and then targets them for 3 turns, making them invulnerable to friendly skills each turn. If used on an enemy affected by 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal', that enemy will take 10 additional damage from this skill and will also ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 2 turns*.

315_2.name: Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal
315_2._originalDescription: Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy, will have 2 additional turns of cooldown and will deal 20 less non-affliction damage.

315_3.name: Earth Release: Boulder Wall
315_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

315_4.name: Achievement: Surrounding Lava
315_4._originalDescription: If Tsuchikage Kurotsuchi uses 'Lava Release: Ash Stone Seal' while having 30 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Surrounding Lava': For 3 turns, she will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage and will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction.

316_0.name: Cleaver Sword: Frontal Cut
316_0._originalDescription: Raikage Darui deals 15 damage to one enemy and gains 1 lightning charge. This skill deals 5 additional damage for each lightning charge on Raikage Darui.

316_1.name: Cleaver Sword: Aerial Cut
316_1._originalDescription: Raikage Darui deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 0 turns. This skill's stun effect lasts 1 additional turn for each lightning charge on Raikage Darui and then removes all lightning charges from him afterwards.

316_2.name: Lightning Body Flicker
316_2._originalDescription: Raikage Darui gains 2 lightning charges. He will have 20 points of damage reduction for 2 turns. This skill stacks.

316_3.name: Sparkling Parry
316_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Raikage Darui invulnerable for 1 turn.

316_4.name: Achievement: Non Stop Chasing
316_4._originalDescription: If Raikage Darui uses 'Cleaver Sword: Aerial Cut' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Non Stop Chasing': For the rest of the game, his skills will ignore invulnerability.

317_0.name: Wind Release: Great Breakthrough
317_0._originalDescription: Akatsuki Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 piercing damage to them.

317_1.name: Hidden Snake
317_1._originalDescription: Akatsuki Orochimaru deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks. This skill becomes 'Binding Snake Glare Spell' for 1 turn after used.

317_2.name: Murderous Taunt
317_2._originalDescription: Akatsuki Orochimaru gains 5 points of damage reduction and targets all enemies permanently. Everytime an enemy uses: a new non-mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will gain 5 points of damage reduction for 1 turn; a new mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Damnation Seal' permanently after used, stacks and ends if Akatsuki Orochimaru dies.

317_3.name: Snake Instinct
317_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Akatsuki Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

317_4.name: Binding Snake Glare Spell
317_4._originalDescription: Akatsuki Orochimaru targets one enemy affected by 'Hidden Snake', dealing 10 affliction damage to them. This enemy will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

317_5.name: Damnation Seal
317_5._originalDescription: Akatsuki Orochimaru stuns one enemy's physical, affliction and strategic skills for 3 turns.

318_0.name: Single Haimaru Brother Tracking
318_0._originalDescription: 'Fang Rotating Fang' will last 1 additional turn permanently. During this time, one target enemy cannot use skills with a counter effect (this is a stun effect). This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it, can only be used 3 times and ends if Inuzuka Hana dies.

318_1.name: Fang Rotating Fang
318_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Inuzuka Hana deals 15 damage to all enemies. During this time, any new skill they use that deal 30 or more direct original damage in any of its versions will be countered*. This skill cannot be countered.

318_2.name: Blood Injection
318_2._originalDescription: Inuzuka Hana targets herself or an ally. Starting the following turn, the target will be healed for 5 health each turn permanently. This skill cannot be used on a target already affected by it.

318_3.name: Three Haimaru Brothers Guard
318_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Inuzuka Hana invulnerable for 1 turn.

319_0.name: Tiger Vision Staring Bullet
319_0._originalDescription: Emotional Energy Sai targets one enemy permanently. When this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 25 damage and this skill will end. If this skill is used on an enemy already affected by it, it will also remove all helpful skills from them. This skill stacks.

319_1.name: Super God Imitating Drawing
319_1._originalDescription: Emotional Energy Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, any new invulnerability skill this enemy uses will last 1 less turn.*

319_2.name: Leadership: Aerial Assist
319_2._originalDescription: Emotional Energy Sai gains 1 white energy and targets his team. After 1 turn, they will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 1 turn. The turn after that, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

319_3.name: High Speed Parry
319_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Emotional Energy Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

320_0.name: Melee Interception
320_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Tatewaki targets one enemy for 1 turn, making the non-conditional stun effects of any new skill this enemy uses last 1 less turn. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Rupture' will stun them for 1 turn if used on them. This skill becomes 'Chakra Shockwave Slash' for 1 turn after used.

320_1.name: Rupture
320_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Tatewaki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.

320_2.name: Battle Nemesis
320_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Tatewaki targets himself and one enemy. After 3 turns, Edo Tensei Tatewaki will die. During this time, if either Edo Tensei Tatewaki or this enemy die, the other will die as well. The target enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns.

320_3.name: Blade Parry
320_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Tatewaki invulnerable for 1 turn.

320_4.name: Chakra Shockwave Slash
320_4._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Tatewaki deals 35 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn makes the non-conditional stun effects of any new skill they use last 1 less turn. This skill cannot be countered.

321_0.name: Machine Gun Havoc
321_0._originalDescription: Ao (B) deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time*, 'Chakra Blade' will remove 1 additional random energy from them. This skill stacks.

321_1.name: Mirror Drone
321_1._originalDescription: Ao (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new energy or affliction-only skill, 'Mirror Drone' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

321_2.name: Chakra Blade
321_2._originalDescription: Ao (B) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 0 random energies from them. This skill ignores invulnerability.

321_3.name: Machine Gun Block
321_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ao (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

321_4.name: Achievement: Jutsu Absorption Arm
321_4._originalDescription: If Ao (B) uses 'Machine Gun Block' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Jutsu Absorption Arm': For the rest of the game, 'Machine Gun Block' will have 2 less turns of cooldown, will be invisible, will no longer make Ao (B) invulnerable and will be able to be used on him or on an ally to reflect all harmful energy skills used on them for 1 turn to the users of those skills.

322_0.name: Counter Flying Kick
322_0._originalDescription: Garou targets himself or an ally, countering the first harmful physical and the first harmful energy skills used on the target for 1 turn. The enemy whose physical skill was countered will have 'High Speed Headbutt' applied on them. The enemy whose energy skill was countered will have 'High Speed Falling Fist' applied on them. This skill is invisible.

322_1.name: Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot
322_1._originalDescription: Garou deals 25 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. For 1 turn, this skill will be unable to be used on the same enemy. This skill stacks.

322_2.name: Shinobi Gauntlet: Shot Barrage
322_2._originalDescription: Garou targets all enemies, applying 'Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot' on all of them. If 'High Speed Headbutt' or 'High Speed Falling Fist' is active on a target of this skill, that skill will be applied again on them.

322_3.name: Shinobi Gauntlet Block
322_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Garou invulnerable for 1 turn.

322_4.name: High Speed Headbutt
322_4._originalDescription: The target takes 15 damage and then has their mental and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns.

322_5.name: High Speed Falling Fist
322_5._originalDescription: The target takes 15 damage and then becomes unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns.

322_6.name: Achievement: Enrage
322_6._originalDescription: If Garou uses 'Shinobi Gauntlet: Explosive Shot' while having 35 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Enrage': For the rest of the game, 'Counter Flying Kick' will have no cooldown.

323_0.name: Shinobi-Ware: Modified Leg
323_0._originalDescription: Delta deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. She will become invulnerable to physical skills for 2 turns. This effect ends if Delta is affected by a new harmful energy or affliction-only skill.

323_1.name: Absorbing Eye
323_1._originalDescription: The next harmful energy or affliction-only skill used on Delta will be countered and then replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and is invisible until triggered.

323_2.name: Shinobi-Ware: Destruction Beam
323_2._originalDescription: Delta deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. This enemy will ignore healing effects permanently. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on any of Delta's allies will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill cannot be removed.

323_3.name: Shinobi-Ware: Rocket Legs
323_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Delta invulnerable for 1 turn.

323_4.name: Achievement: Spy Drone
323_4._originalDescription: If Delta uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Destruction Beam' and then uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Rocket Legs' the turn right after, she will achieve 'Achievement: Spy Drone': For 2 turns, her skills will ignore invulnerability.

324_0.name: Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones
324_0._originalDescription: Iou deals 10 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new strategic skill, they will take 5 damage. They will be permanently marked by this skill. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

324_1.name: Sealing-Tagged Stone
324_1._originalDescription: Iou targets all enemies marked by 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones', dealing 15 damage to them, stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn and removing 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones' from them.

324_2.name: Rushed Kunai Slash
324_2._originalDescription: Iou deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy is marked by 'Earth Release: Flying Thrown Stones', they will also deal 10 less damage with physical and energy skills for 1 turn.

324_3.name: Kunai Parry
324_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Iou invulnerable for 1 turn.

325_0.name: Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target
325_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will deal 5 less physical and energy damage. This skill stacks.

325_1.name: Iron Sand Gathering Assault
325_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will deal 10 less physical and energy damage, 'Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target' will deal 10 additional damage and this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill stacks.

325_2.name: Iron Sand Manipulation
325_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage reduces all enemies' physical and energy damage by 5 for 2 turns. For 2 turns, 'Iron Sand Drizzle: Single Target' and 'Iron Sand Gathering Assault' will cost 1 less random energy and Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage will have 20 points of destructible defense.

325_3.name: Impure Endurance
325_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sandaime Kazekage invulnerable for 1 turn.

326_0.name: Sealing Technique: Frog Suppression
326_0._originalDescription: Kashin Koji targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, everytime they use a new physical, energy or mental skill, they will take 10 additional damage from skills with the other 2 mentioned classes for 1 turn.

326_1.name: Surprise Rasengan
326_1._originalDescription: Kashin Koji deals 25 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

326_2.name: True Fire of Samadhi
326_2._originalDescription: Kashin Koji deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 4 turns and 15 affliction damage to all allies instantly. All characters will ignore healing effects for 4 turns. This skill cannot be ignored or removed.

326_3.name: Shurikenjutsu Interception
326_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kashin Koji invulnerable for 1 turn.

326_4.name: Achievement: Boiler Toad
326_4._originalDescription: If Kashin Koji uses 'Surprise Rasengan' while 'Sealing Technique: Frog Suppression' and 'True Fire of Samadhi' are both active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Boiler Toad': He will gain 1 additional random energy each turn for 3 turns.

327_0.name: Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet
327_0._originalDescription: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns, deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and makes them take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills for 1 turn. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Flame Attack' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

327_1.name: Fire Release: Flame Attack
327_1._originalDescription: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns, deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

327_2.name: Sage Art: Five Fire Gods' Fan of Flames
327_2._originalDescription: Sennin Koji gains 10 points of destructible defense for 2 turns and deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 'Fire Release: Big Flame Bullet' and 'Fire Release: Flame Attack' applied on them. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

327_3.name: Ninja Art: Needle Jizou
327_3._originalDescription: After 1 turn, this skill makes Sennin Koji invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

327_4.name: Achievement: Wild Lion's Mane
327_4._originalDescription: If Sennin Koji is targeted by a new harmful physical skill after using 'Ninja Art: Needle Jizou' and before becoming invulnerable from it, he will achieve 'Achievement: Wild Lion's Mane': For the rest of the game, he will have 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction. This damage reduction effect cannot be ignored.

328_0.name: Karma Cleanse
328_0._originalDescription: Karma Boruto targets his team for 3 turns. During this time, all harmful energy and affliction skills will be removed from them each turn. 'Karma Rasengan' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

328_1.name: Karma Rift
328_1._originalDescription: Karma Boruto targets any character. For 1 turn, the target will be invulnerable to harmful skills and will have their harmful skills stunned. Karma Boruto takes 5 affliction damage.*

328_2.name: Karma Rasengan
328_2._originalDescription: Karma Boruto deals 35 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction skills for 1 turn.

328_3.name: Karma Absorption
328_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Karma Boruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

328_4.name: Achievement: Ootsutsukification
328_4._originalDescription: If Karma Boruto uses 'Karma Rasengan' 3 times in the game with at least 1 stack of 'Karma Cleanse', he will achieve 'Achievement: Ootsutsukification': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 50 health. For the rest of the game, he will gain 20 points of damage reduction and his skills will be replaced by Ootsutsuki Boruto's skills.

329_0.name: Ootsutsuki Havoc
329_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Boruto deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Boruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability.

329_1.name: Ootsutsuki Recovery
329_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Boruto heals one ally or himself for 15 health. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Boruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability.

329_2.name: Ootsutsuki Chou Oodama Rasengan
329_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Boruto makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 45 damage to them.

329_3.name: Ootsutsuki Rampage
329_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Boruto gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, 'Ootsutsuki Havoc' will permanently increase its own damage by 5 and 'Ootsutsuki Recovery' will permanently increase its own healing by 5 whenever used. During this time, Ootsutsuki Boruto will take 5 affliction damage* each turn, will ignore healing effects and every enemy who uses a new skill on him will deal 5 less non-affliction damage that turn. This skill cannot be used while active.

329_4.name: Achievement: Ootsutsuki Byakugan
329_4._originalDescription: If Ootsutsuki Boruto uses 'Ootsutsuki Chou Oodama Rasengan' while 'Ootsutsuki Rampage' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Ootsutsuki Byakugan': For the rest of the game, 'Ootsutsuki Havoc' will, for 1 turn, make any new invisible skill its target uses become visible.

330_0.name: Chakra Fishing Rod
330_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Urashiki deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy, Ootsutsuki Urashiki will gain 1 random energy and the skill they used will replace 'Chakra Bowl' (or the skill in its spot) permanently.

330_2.name: Heavenly Essential Wave Current Star Lord
330_2._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Urashiki deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if any of them uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy and Ootsutsuki Urashiki will gain 1 random energy.

330_3.name: Fishing Rod Block
330_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ootsutsuki Urashiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

330_4.name: Achievement: Doujutsu Mastery
330_4._originalDescription: If Ootsutsuki Urashiki uses 'Fishing Rod Block' and then uses 'Heavenly Essential Wave Current Star Lord' the turn right after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Doujutsu Mastery': All harmful skills are removed from him, he is healed for 20 health and his skills will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn.

331_0.name: Monster Wing: Gale
331_0._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. For 1 turn, his team will be invulnerable to physical skills. For 2 turns, 'Dragon Palace' will cost 1 less white energy, will deal 15 less damage and will not stun its target.*

331_1.name: Jeweled Box
331_1._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, 'Dragon Palace' will cost 1 less red energy, will deal 15 less damage and will not remove energy from its target.* This skill does not stack on Chakra Fruit Urashiki and will re-apply itself on him.

331_2.name: Dragon Palace
331_2._originalDescription: Chakra Fruit Urashiki deals 55 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them for 1 turn and removes 1 random energy from them.

331_3.name: Monster Flight
331_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Chakra Fruit Urashiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

331_4.name: Achievement: Chakra Eating
331_4._originalDescription: If Chakra Fruit Urashiki uses 'Dragon Palace' twice in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra Eating': For 5 turns, he will be invulnerable to energy and affliction-only skills.

332_0.name: Enka Master Inspiration
332_0._originalDescription: Sabu targets one ally or himself, making the target invulnerable to non-strategic skills and granting them lifelink for 1 turn.

332_1.name: Yosaku Cut
332_1._originalDescription: Sabu deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. One random member of Sabu's team will have lifelink for 1 turn.

332_2.name: Enka Calling: Ponta
332_2._originalDescription: Sabu targets his team for 3 turns, granting them 10 points of damage reduction and healing them for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Ponta Saving' for 2 turns after used and ends if Sabu dies.

332_3.name: Yosaku Guard
332_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Sabu invulnerable for 1 turn.

332_4.name: Ponta Saving
332_4._originalDescription: Sabu targets one ally. For 2 turns, the first time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 30, will gain 1 random energy and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

333_0.name: Dark Cloud
333_0._originalDescription: Boro targets all enemies for 8 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, they will die instantly. For the rest of the game, Boro will be healed for 5 health each turn and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill cannot be used while active and ends if Boro dies.

333_1.name: Lava Release: Planet-Branding Blast
333_1._originalDescription: Boro deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their strategic skills for 1 turn. If 'Dark Cloud' is active on this enemy, it will be removed from them and then applied again on them lasting 4 turns only.

333_2.name: Self-Healing Technique
333_2._originalDescription: Boro heals himself for 20 health. For the rest of the game, this skill will heal 5 additional health and 'Lava Release: Planet-Branding Blast' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

333_3.name: Water Release: Water Formation Wall
333_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Boro invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Dark Cloud' is active, this skill will grant him 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn instead.

333_4.name: Achievement: Body Mutation
333_4._originalDescription: If Boro uses 'Self-Healing Technique' while having 15 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Body Mutation': He is healed for 100 health and gains 50 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Rampage Boro's skills.

334_0.name: Explosive Collar
334_0._originalDescription: Sanzu Amado targets one enemy permanently. When that enemy uses a new skill, they will be dealt 35 piercing damage and this skill will end. This skill stacks.

334_1.name: Sonic Tuning Fork
334_1._originalDescription: Sanzu Amado targets one enemy and another random enemy permanently. When they use a new skill, it will be countered and this skill will end on that enemy.

334_2.name: Anesthetic Injection
334_2._originalDescription: Sanzu Amado deals 15 damage to one enemy. This enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage until the next time they use a new harmful skill. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

334_3.name: Prepared Hideout
334_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Sanzu Amado invulnerable for 1 turn.

334_4.name: Achievement: Calling a Cyborg
334_4._originalDescription: If Sanzu Amado uses either 'Explosive Collar' 3 times or 'Anesthetic Injection' 4 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Calling a Cyborg': He becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by: Delta's if the skill used was 'Explosive Collar'; Kashin Koji's if the skill used was 'Anesthetic Injection'.

335_0.name: Chakra-Paralyzing Rod
335_0._originalDescription: Jigen deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's energy skills will cost 1 additional random energy and if they use a new non-energy skill, 'Hell From Below' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently. This effect stacks.

335_1.name: Hell From Below
335_1._originalDescription: Jigen deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

335_2.name: All-Sealing Jar
335_2._originalDescription: Jigen targets one enemy permanently, each turn removing 1 random energy from them. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Jigen*. The first enemy to use a new harmful skill on Jigen will take 15 damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn.* During this time, Jigen will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.*

335_3.name: Karma Rift: Dimensional Travel
335_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Jigen or one target ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

335_4.name: Achievement: True Chakra Reveal
335_4._originalDescription: If Jigen is targeted by a new harmful physical skill right after using 'Chakra-Paralyzing Rod' and then uses 'Hell From Below' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: True Chakra Reveal': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 50 health. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Ootsutsuki Isshiki's skills.

336_0.name: Sukunahikona
336_0._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets himself or one ally. For 1 turn, the target's skills will cost 1 random energy less and any enemy that targets them with a new skill will deal 15 less non-affliction damage that turn. During this time, the first time the target is targeted by a new harmful skill, they will gain 1 red and 1 white energy. This skill is invisible.

336_1.name: Disruption Cube
336_1._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Isshiki deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, all enemies' mental and strategic skills will be stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

336_2.name: Hellish Heaven
336_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, every original non-affliction damage dealt to Ootsutsuki Isshiki's team will be capped at 15; this effect cannot be ignored. This skill will be replaced by 'Heavenly Hell' for 1 turn after used. This skill is invisible.

336_3.name: Karma: Isshiki
336_3._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets one ally permanently. If their health drops to 30 or below while Ootsutsuki Isshiki is dead, that ally will be healed for 70 health, will have all helpful and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced by Ootsutsuki Isshiki's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

336_4.name: Heavenly Hell
336_4._originalDescription: Ootsutsuki Isshiki targets all enemies, dealing 20 damage to them and then stunning their non-mental skills for 2 turns.

336_5.name: Achievement: Raging Will
336_5._originalDescription: If Ootsutsuki Isshiki uses 'Disruption Cube' while 'Heavenly Hell' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Raging Will': For the rest of the game, his skills will have no cost, he will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and he will ignore healing effects.

337_0.name: Tail Cocoon
337_0._originalDescription: Baryon Naruto heals one ally for 20 health for 2 turns. During this time, any enemy that targets this ally with a new skill will lose 1 random energy. This skill ends if Baryon Naruto dies.

337_1.name: Tail Prison
337_1._originalDescription: Baryon Naruto stuns one enemy's physical skills for 3 turns.

337_2.name: Baryon Rasengan
337_2._originalDescription: Baryon Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 25 health Baryon Naruto has lost. For 1 turn, if 'Tail Prison' is used, it will stun physical and strategic skills, instead of physical skills only.

337_3.name: Kamikaze Taijutsu
337_3._originalDescription: Baryon Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy and takes 15 affliction damage.* For 1 turn, Baryon Naruto will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill deals 10 additional damage with each use (the self-damage is not increased).

337_4.name: Achievement: Payback
337_4._originalDescription: If Baryon Naruto uses 'Baryon Rasengan' while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Payback': He takes 15 affliction damage and gains 3 random energies.

338_0.name: Purple Raikiri
338_0._originalDescription: Hatake Kakashi (B) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow' for 1 turn after used.

338_1.name: Earth Release: Multitude of Walls
338_1._originalDescription: For 2 turns, the physical and energy skills of Hatake Kakashi (B)'s team will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage. During this time, all enemies are targeted and if any of them uses a new harmful skill, then for 1 turn that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy and they will take 25 additional damage from Hatake Kakashi (B)'s skills.

338_2.name: Demonic Illusion: Hell Viewing
338_2._originalDescription: Hatake Kakashi (B) will ignore enemy damage for 1 turn. This skill costs 1 additional random energy with each use. This skill is invisible.

338_3.name: Substitution Technique
338_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

338_4.name: Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow
338_4._originalDescription: Hatake Kakashi (B) makes one enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 25 damage and 25 piercing damage to them.

338_5.name: Achievement: No Need of a Sharingan
338_5._originalDescription: If Hatake Kakashi (B) uses 'Purple Raikiri: Finishing Blow' while 'Earth Release: Multitude of Walls' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: No Need of a Sharingan': For the rest of the game, his skills will cost 1 less blue energy.

339_0.name: Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death
339_0._originalDescription: Sarutobi Mirai targets one enemy, who will take 35 piercing damage after 1 turn. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, all already active helpful skills will be removed from them and this skill will then end on them.

339_1.name: Wind Release: Whirlwind Fist
339_1._originalDescription: Sarutobi Mirai deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their energy skills for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 green energy instead and if used again, it will stun physical skills instead. This skill ends if Sarutobi Mirai dies.

339_2.name: Fire Release: Flint Yagura
339_2._originalDescription: Sarutobi Mirai deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 3 turns. This damage cannot be increased or decreased. During this time, any new skill they use that deal 35 or more direct original damage in any of its versions will be countered. This skill ends if Sarutobi Mirai dies.

339_3.name: Blade Parry
339_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Sarutobi Mirai invulnerable for 1 turn.

339_4.name: Achievement: Field Control
339_4._originalDescription: If Sarutobi Mirai uses 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death' while having 40 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Field Control': For 3 turns, if a new harmful skill is used on her, she will become invulnerable to all other harmful skills for the rest of that turn.

340_0.name: Nasal Fluid Interference
340_0._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Ise Udon's team. If used on an enemy, they will deal 100% less damage for 1 turn and will take 10 additional damage from 'Nose Water Tree' permanently. If used on a member of Ise Udon's team, they will ignore enemy damage for 1 turn and 'Nose Water Tree' will last 1 additional turn on them permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible on the first turn.

340_1.name: Nose Water Tree
340_1._originalDescription: Ise Udon deals 20 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

340_2.name: Situation Analysis
340_2._originalDescription: Ise Udon targets all characters. One random enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Nose Water Tree' permanently. 'Nose Water Tree' will last 1 additional turn on one random member of Ise Udon's team permanently. This skill stacks.

340_3.name: Jounin Speed
340_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ise Udon invulnerable for 1 turn.

340_4.name: Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal
340_4._originalDescription: If Ise Udon uses 'Nose Water Tree' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal': 'Nose Water Tree' is removed from him. His skills will cost 1 less red energy for 2 turns.

341_0.name: Water Release: Water Hail
341_0._originalDescription: Kazamatsuri Moegi deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will target all enemies instead if used again.

341_1.name: Earth Release: Gravel
341_1._originalDescription: Kazamatsuri Moegi stuns one enemy for 1 turn. Also for 1 turn, one random member of her team will be unable to be killed.

341_2.name: Earth Release: Earth-Style Wall
341_2._originalDescription: Kazamatsuri Moegi targets her team. For 1 turn, the first new harmful non-affliction damage skill that is used on each member of her team will deal no damage to them and that character will gain permanent destructible defense equal to the original damage of that skill. This skill is invisible.

341_3.name: Kunai Parry
341_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kazamatsuri Moegi invulnerable for 1 turn.

341_4.name: Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal
341_4._originalDescription: If Kazamatsuri Moegi uses 'Earth Release: Gravel' and then uses 'Water Release: Water Hail' the turn right after, she will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra-Sharpening Seal': 'Water Release: Water Hail' will cost 1 less blue energy for 1 turn.

342_0.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm
342_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hanabi (B) destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and deals 30 damage to them. If the enemy is affected by 'Mastered Byakugan Sight', they will also lose 1 random energy instantly. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses an energy drain, removal or gain skill, they will take 20 damage.

342_1.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
342_1._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hanabi (B) targets herself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first harmful skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will take 35 damage. This skill is invisible.

342_2.name: Mastered Byakugan Sight
342_2._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Hyuuga Hanabi (B)'s team will gain 5 points of damage reduction and all new invisible skills all enemies use will become visible. During this time, 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' will remove 1 random energy from the affected enemies if used on them and will have 1 additional turn of cooldown.

342_3.name: Insightful Dodge
342_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Hanabi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

342_4.name: Achievement: Gentle Fist Follow-Up
342_4._originalDescription: If Hyuuga Hanabi (B) uses 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' 3 times in the game, she will achieve 'Achievement: Gentle Fist Follow-Up': For the rest of the game, 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' will also grant Hyuuga Hanabi (B) 1 green energy when used.

343_0.name: Quick Punch / Quick Heal
343_0._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team. If used on an enemy, they will be dealt 20 damage. If used on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team, they will be healed for 20 health.

343_1.name: Major Punch / Major Heal
343_1._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team. If used on an enemy, they will be dealt 30 damage and then ignore healing effects for 2 turns. If used on a member of Uchiha Sakura's team, they will be healed for 30 health and will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn.

343_2.name: Frontline Warrior
