343_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Uchiha Sakura will be healed for 10 health each turn, will be unable to be killed and 'Quick Punch / Quick Heal' and 'Major Punch / Major Heal' will target all enemies and all members of Uchiha Sakura's team whenever used. During this time, said skills will have 1 additional turn of cooldown.

343_3.name: Blocking Punch
343_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

343_4.name: Achievement: Environment Interaction
343_4._originalDescription: If Uchiha Sakura is targeted by a new harmful direct stun skill while 'Frontline Warrior' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Environment Interaction': She will be invulnerable to non-mental skills for 2 turns.

344_0.name: Secret Technique: Bug Prison
344_0._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (B) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy each turn permanently. The next skill that this enemy uses will be countered and then this skill will end. This skill becomes 'Chakra-Eating Assault' for 1 turn after used.

344_1.name: Hidden Consumption
344_1._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (B) targets one enemy. For 4 turns, everytime this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy.

344_2.name: Bug Thread: Protective Trap
344_2._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (B) targets himself or one ally. For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on the target will be countered and 'Hidden Consumption' will be applied on the countered enemy. If this skill does not counter an enemy skill, Aburame Shino (B) will gain 1 red and 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

344_3.name: Surrounding Protectors
344_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Aburame Shino (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

344_4.name: Chakra-Eating Assault
344_4._originalDescription: Aburame Shino (B) deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy affected (and not countered yet) by 'Secret Technique: Bug Prison' and steals 1 random energy from them.

344_5.name: Achievement: Giant Bug Wall
344_5._originalDescription: If Aburame Shino (B) uses 'Chakra-Eating Assault' while 'Hidden Consumption' is active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Giant Bug Wall': He gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense and for the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on him, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from Aburame Shino (B)'s skills permanently.

345_0.name: Karasu Head Stab
345_0._originalDescription: Kankuro (B) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 15 additional damage for each stack of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance' and removes all stacks afterwards.

345_1.name: Chakra Thread Prison
345_1._originalDescription: Kankuro (B) stuns one enemy for 0 turns. This skill lasts 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance' and removes all stacks afterwards.

345_2.name: Puppet Preparation: Enhance
345_2._originalDescription: Kankuro (B) gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense, improves 'Karasu Head Stab' and 'Chakra Thread Prison' and makes them cost 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill stacks.

345_3.name: Expert Backflip
345_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kankuro (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

345_4.name: Achievement: Expert Puppeteer
345_4._originalDescription: If Kankuro (B) gets 4 stacks of 'Puppet Preparation: Enhance', he will achieve 'Achievement: Expert Puppeteer': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore enemy stun effects.

346_0.name: Cutting Whirlwind: Go Down
346_0._originalDescription: Nara Temari deals 20 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. 'Cutting Whirlwind: Go Up' will deal 5 additional damage for the rest of the game. This skill stacks.

346_1.name: Cutting Whirlwind: Go Up
346_1._originalDescription: Nara Temari deals 20 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to energy, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. 'Cutting Whirlwind: Go Down' will deal 5 additional damage for the rest of the game. This skill stacks.

346_2.name: Moon Increase: Offense & Defense
346_2._originalDescription: Nara Temari gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, 'Reactive Fan Block' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks.

346_3.name: Reactive Fan Block
346_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Nara Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.

346_4.name: Wind Release: Multi-Task of the Dragon
346_4._originalDescription: Nara Temari deals 35 piercing damage to all enemies and makes her team invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 15 less damage.

346_5.name: Achievement: Dragon Wind Awakening
346_5._originalDescription: If Nara Temari uses 'Moon Increase: Offense & Defense' 3 times in the game, she will achieve 'Achievement: Dragon Wind Awakening': For the rest of the game, 'Moon Increase: Offense & Defense' will be replaced by 'Wind Release: Multi-Task of the Dragon'.

347_0.name: Carbon Cube Rain
347_0._originalDescription: For 3 turns, Deepa deals 10 damage to all enemies and makes their energy drain or removal skills remove 1 less random energy*. During this time, if Deepa is targeted by*: a new harmful physical skill, 'Carbon Ring' will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn; a new harmful non-physical skill, 'Carbon Whip' will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn.

347_1.name: Carbon Ring
347_1._originalDescription: Deepa deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

347_2.name: Carbon Whip
347_2._originalDescription: Deepa deals 15 damage to all enemies and makes his team ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn.

347_3.name: Partial Carbon Cover
347_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Deepa invulnerable for 1 turn.

347_4.name: Achievement: Carbon Armor
347_4._originalDescription: If Deepa uses 'Carbon Ring' while having 50 or less health and then uses 'Partial Carbon Cover' and 'Carbon Whip' consecutively anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Carbon Armor': For the rest of the game, every original non-affliction damage dealt to him will be capped at 10; this effect cannot be ignored.

348_0.name: Rampage Mode
348_0._originalDescription: Rampage Boro targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new non-strategic skill, 'Self-Rage' will cost 1 less random energy for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Self-Rage' permanently after used, cannot be countered or reflected, ignores invulnerability and ends if Rampage Boro dies or if it's removed from any of the affected characters.

348_1.name: Rampage Punch
348_1._originalDescription: Rampage Boro deals 30 damage to one enemy, plus 5 damage for each skill Rampage Boro has used. The target enemy will be stunned for 0 turns, plus 1 turn for each skill Rampage Boro has used (up to 9 turns).

348_2.name: Rampage Crush
348_2._originalDescription: Rampage Boro deals 20 damage to all enemies and makes his team ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 0 turns, plus 1 turn for each skill Rampage Boro has used.

348_3.name: Enhanced Endurance
348_3._originalDescription: Rampage Boro grants himself 30 points of permanent destructible defense and grants his allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense. These values are increased by 5 for each skill Rampage Boro has used.

348_5.name: Achievement: Enraged Rampage
348_5._originalDescription: If Rampage Boro gets 5 stacks of 'Self-Rage', he will achieve 'Achievement: Enraged Rampage': All skills are removed from him and 'Rampage Mode' cannot be used again. He is healed for 50 health and then will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 3 turns. During this time, 'Rampage Punch' will instantly kill the target and 'Rampage Crush' will deal 10 additional damage.

348_6.name: Skill Counter
348_6._originalDescription: This is a counter of how many skills Rampage Boro has used.

349_0.name: Shadow Binding Ambush
349_0._originalDescription: Nara Shikamaru (B) deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new mental or affliction skill, their mental and affliction skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

349_1.name: Effortless Shadow Imitation
349_1._originalDescription: Nara Shikamaru (B) deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new mental or affliction skill, their physical, energy and strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

349_2.name: Master Analysis: Battlefield Control
349_2._originalDescription: Nara Shikamaru (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses: a new non-strategic skill, 'Shadow Binding Ambush' and 'Effortless Shadow Imitation' will deal 15 additional damage for 1 turn; a new invulnerability skill, 'Shadow Binding Ambush' and 'Effortless Shadow Imitation' will make Nara Shikamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn; a new energy gain/removal/steal skill, Nara Shikamaru (B) will gain 1 white energy. This skill is invisible.

349_3.name: Defensive Shadow Hold
349_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

349_4.name: Achievement: Love-Driven Analysis
349_4._originalDescription: If Nara Shikamaru (B) uses 'Defensive Shadow Hold' after killing an enemy using either 'Shadow Binding Ambush' or 'Effortless Shadow Imitation', he will achieve 'Achievement: Love-Driven Analysis': For the rest of the game, 'Master Analysis: Battlefield Control' will last permanently on its enemy target, will be visible and will be usable only once more.

350_0.name: Furious Punch
350_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy.

350_1.name: Memory Extraction
350_1._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets one enemy for 1 turn. If they use a new skill, Yamanaka Ino (B) will copy it and it will replace this skill for 1 turn and her skills will cost 1 less green, red, blue and random energies also for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

350_2.name: Sensing Machine
350_2._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets all enemies and all allies. For 3 turns, all new invisible skills all enemies use will become visible and they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. Every turn during this time, the first harmful mental or strategic skill used on each ally will be countered. This skill becomes 'Sensory Surveillance' for 3 turns after used, cannot be countered or reflected and ends if Yamanaka Ino (B) dies.

350_3.name: Defensive Telepathy
350_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

350_4.name: Sensory Surveillance
350_4._originalDescription: Yamanaka Ino (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, they will be countered, will take 25 piercing damage and Yamanaka Ino (B) will gain 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

350_5.name: Achievement: Unsearchable Mind
350_5._originalDescription: If Yamanaka Ino (B) uses any skill while 'Sensing Machine' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Unsearchable Mind': For the rest of the game, Yamanaka Ino (B) will become invulnerable to mental skills.

351_0.name: Elbow Hit
351_0._originalDescription: Rock Lee (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy. 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 20 additional damage the next time it's used. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

351_1.name: High Speed Punch
351_1._originalDescription: Rock Lee (B) deals 40 damage to one enemy. 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 30 additional damage the next time it's used. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

351_2.name: Inner Gate Charge
351_2._originalDescription: For 3 turns, the damage of the next use of 'High Pressure Kick' will be increased by 10 each turn. During this time, everytime a new harmful skill is used on Rock Lee (B), 'High Pressure Kick' will deal 10 additional damage the next time it's used. This effect stacks.

351_3.name: High Pressure Kick
351_3._originalDescription: Rock Lee (B) deals 0 damage to one enemy and 20 additional damage for each 30 health Rock Lee (B) has lost. Afterwards, Rock Lee (B)'s skills will be removed from him if active. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

351_4.name: Achievement: Will of the Youth
351_4._originalDescription: If Rock Lee (B) is targeted by a new harmful skill right after using 'High Pressure Kick', he will achieve 'Achievement: Will of the Youth': He will gain 1 green energy. For 2 turns, he will be unable to be killed.

352_0.name: Dance of the Serpent
352_0._originalDescription: Orochimaru (B) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. All the other enemies will have their affliction and strategic skills stunned for 1 turn.

352_1.name: Limb Regeneration
352_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, the first time Orochimaru (B) is targeted by a new harmful skill, he will be healed for 40 health. This skill is invisible.

352_2.name: Four Black Snakes Formation
352_2._originalDescription: Orochimaru (B) deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. All the other enemies will take 5 affliction damage instantly and each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

352_3.name: Sword Deflection
352_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Orochimaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

352_4.name: Achievement: Giant Snake Ambush
352_4._originalDescription: If Orochimaru (B) uses 'Dance of the Serpent', 'Limb Regeneration' and 'Four Black Snakes Formation' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Giant Snake Ambush': For the rest of the game, 'Dance of the Serpent' and 'Four Black Snakes Formation' will apply all their effects on all enemies instead whenever used.

353_0.name: Unexpected Neck Jab
353_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Art of the Attacking Bird' will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

353_1.name: Art of the Attacking Bird
353_1._originalDescription: Yamanaka Sai deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy, who will take 15 piercing damage the turn after. For 1 turn, 'Art of the Majestic Bird' will deal 5 additional damage and grant 5 additional points of destructible defense.

353_2.name: Painting Preparation
353_2._originalDescription: Yamanaka Sai targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use: a new harmful skill, 'Art of the Attacking Bird' will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn; a new friendly skill, Yamanaka Sai will become invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Art of the Majestic Bird' permanently after used and ends if Yamanaka Sai dies.

353_3.name: Tactical Retreat
353_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

353_4.name: Art of the Majestic Bird
353_4._originalDescription: Yamanaka Sai deals 20 damage to all enemies and grants his team 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

353_5.name: Achievement: Custom Scroll
353_5._originalDescription: If Yamanaka Sai uses 'Unexpected Neck Jab' while having 70 or less health and then uses 'Art of the Attacking Bird' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Custom Scroll': For the rest of the game, the damage of 'Art of the Majestic Bird' will be concentrated on one target enemy.

354_0.name: Shinobi-Ware: Razor Sharp Talons
354_0._originalDescription: Code targets all enemies marked by 'Claw Mark', dealing 20 piercing damage to them and killing them if their health drops to 5 or below. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on him will be dealt 10 piercing damage.

354_1.name: Shinobi-Ware: Giant Claw
354_1._originalDescription: Code targets all enemies marked by 'Claw Mark', dealing 30 damage to them and stunning their harmful skills for 1 turn. The next enemy that uses a new skill on him will lose 1 random energy. This skill stacks.

354_2.name: Claw Mark
354_2._originalDescription: Code deals 5 damage to one enemy and then marks that enemy for 4 turns. For 1 turn, Code will ignore enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects. This skill ends if Code dies, cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and needs an available enemy to be used.

354_3.name: Claw Mark Escape
354_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Code invulnerable for 1 turn.

354_4.name: Achievement: White Karma
354_4._originalDescription: If Code uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Razor Sharp Talons' at least 3 times in the game and then uses 'Shinobi-Ware: Giant Claw' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: White Karma': For the rest of the game, the damage of his skills will be increased by 10 permanently each turn.

355_0.name: Sage Art: Life-Draining Coil
355_0._originalDescription: Sennin Mitsuki targets one enemy for 3 turns, each turn stealing 10 health from them. During this time**, if this enemy uses a new invulnerability skill, they will take 20 affliction damage*. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Sennin Mitsuki dies.

355_1.name: Natural Energy Boost
355_1._originalDescription: Sennin Mitsuki heals one ally for 15 health. For 1 turn, that ally's non-affliction skills will deal 5 additional damage and their non-strategic skills will cost 1 less random energy. After its third use, instead of doing its original effects, this skill will make one ally's skills cost 2 random energies instead for 1 turn.

355_2.name: Sage Art: Great Snake Lightning
355_2._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Sennin Mitsuki becomes invulnerable* and deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy each turn. During this time, his allies will deal 5 additional damage with energy skills*.

355_3.name: High Speed Escape
355_3._originalDescription: Sennin Mitsuki makes his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

355_4.name: Achievement: Quick Recharge
355_4._originalDescription: If Sennin Mitsuki uses any skill while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Quick Recharge': He will be healed for 10 health each turn for 3 turns.

356_0.name: Earth Release: Rock Gun Technique
356_0._originalDescription: Mugino deals 10 damage to one enemy and reduces this enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 10 piercing damage and their damage will be reduced by 10 for 1 turn.

356_1.name: Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction
356_1._originalDescription: Mugino deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns and makes them ignore all helpful counters on them during this time*. Mugino's team will be grant 10 points of permanent destructible defense* that stacks. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

356_2.name: Trapping Approach
356_2._originalDescription: Mugino targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical or energy skill, they will be countered. If successfully countered, they will take 10 additional damage from Mugino's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and stacks.

356_3.name: Spotless Defense
356_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mugino invulnerable for 1 turn.

356_4.name: Achievement: Barrier Release
356_4._originalDescription: If Mugino uses 'Earth Release: Rock Gun Technique' twice in a row, he will achieve 'Achievement: Barrier Release': For the rest of the game, 'Earth Release: Rock Lodging Destruction' will also remove all harmful stun skills from Mugino's team when used.

357_0.name: Jutsu Absorption Arm
357_0._originalDescription: Touno Katasuke targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on the target will be reflected back to their users. This skill will cost 1 additional random energy for 2 turns. This skill stacks and is invisible on the first turn.

357_1.name: Stored Jutsu Barrage
357_1._originalDescription: Touno Katasuke deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' will deal 10 additional damage for 3 turns. This effect stacks.

357_2.name: Shinobi Gauntlet
357_2._originalDescription: Touno Katasuke grants one ally 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and replaces the skill in their fourth slot with 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, this ally will deal 10 additional damage with 'Stored Jutsu Barrage'. This skill stacks.

357_3.name: Hiding Tactics
357_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Touno Katasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

357_4.name: Achievement: Reinforced Gauntlet
357_4._originalDescription: If Touno Katasuke uses 'Shinobi Gauntlet' while 'Jutsu Absorption Arm' and 'Stored Jutsu Barrage' are both active on him, he will achieve 'Achievement: Reinforced Gauntlet': For 4 turns, new uses of 'Jutsu Absorption Arm' will not increase its own cost.

358_0.name: Giant Butterfly Wings
358_0._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouji (B) targets himself for 3 turns, each turn permanently increasing the damage of 'Butterfly Destruction Blow' by 10. During this time, Akimichi Chouji (B) gains 15 points of damage reduction and if he is targeted by a new harmful direct stun skill, he will gain 2 random energies.

358_1.name: Butterfly Destruction Blow
358_1._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouji (B) destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense, deals 25 damage to them, stuns them for 1 turn and makes them ignore healing effects for 1 turn. 'Giant Butterfly Wings' will be removed from Akimichi Chouji (B).

358_2.name: Super Multi-Size Technique
358_2._originalDescription: Akimichi Chouji (B) gains 75 points of permanent destructible defense. While Akimichi Chouji (B) has destructible defense from this skill, any enemy who uses a new skill on him will ignore healing effects until the destructible defense is up. This skill does not stack on Akimichi Chouji (B) and will re-apply itself.

358_3.name: Butterfly Blocking Palm
358_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

358_4.name: Achievement: Protein Eating
358_4._originalDescription: If Akimichi Chouji (B) uses 'Butterfly Destruction Blow' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Protein Eating': He is healed for 20 health instantly and 10 health each following turn permanently.

359_0.name: Prepared Net Trap
359_0._originalDescription: Tenten (B) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 10 damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

359_1.name: Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army
359_1._originalDescription: Tenten (B) deals 10 damage to all enemies for 4 turns.

359_2.name: Ninja Tool Shop
359_2._originalDescription: Tenten (B) targets one ally, replacing all of that ally's skills with her set of tools for 1 turn.

359_3.name: Skilled Jounin Retreat
359_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Tenten (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

359_4.name: Shuriken Toy
359_4._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, this character will have 5 points of damage reduction and their skills that directly grant destructible defense will grant 5 additional points of destructible defense. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

359_5.name: Average Tool Set
359_5._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, this character will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

359_6.name: Special Makeshift Kunai
359_6._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, this character will deal 15 piercing damage to any enemy who uses a new skill on them. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

359_7.name: Six Paths Sacred Treasures
359_7._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, this character will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes and all harmful skills will be removed from them each turn. This skill will be unable to be used again by this character.

359_8.name: Achievement: Puppet Triggering
359_8._originalDescription: If Tenten (B) uses 'Ninja Tool Shop' 3 times in the game while 'Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Puppet Triggering': For the rest of the game, the next uses of 'Summoning: Shooting Puppet Army' will last permanently instead.

360_0.name: Water Spirit Wave Bullet
360_0._originalDescription: Shigaraki Sumire deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if she is targeted by a new harmful skill, 'Water Spirit Wave Bullet' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This effect can only activate once per usage. This skill stacks.

360_1.name: Underworld Lifeforce Transfer
360_1._originalDescription: Shigaraki Sumire heals one ally for 10 health each turn permanently. During this time, Shigaraki Sumire will take 10 affliction damage* each turn and will ignore healing effects. This skill cannot be removed, cannot be used while active and ends if Shigaraki Sumire dies.

360_2.name: Major Summoning: Awakened Nue
360_2._originalDescription: Shigaraki Sumire removes all helpful skills from all enemies and all harmful skills from all members of her team. All enemies take 20 damage and all members of her team gain 10 points of permanent damage reduction. This skill becomes 'Chakra Absorption Tendrils' permanently after used.

360_3.name: Splashing Water Clone
360_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Shigaraki Sumire invulnerable for 1 turn.

360_4.name: Chakra Absorption Tendrils
360_4._originalDescription: Shigaraki Sumire targets one enemy, stealing 15 health and 1 random energy from them.

360_5.name: Achievement: Underworld Parasite
360_5._originalDescription: If Shigaraki Sumire uses 'Underworld Lifeforce Transfer' while 'Major Summoning: Awakened Nue' is active, she will achieve 'Achievement: Underworld Parasite': For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on her, that enemy will take 15 affliction damage*.

361_0.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Hands
361_0._originalDescription: Mitarashi Anko (B) deals 5 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy. 'Field of Snakes' will last 1 additional turn and have 1 additional turn of cooldown the next time it's used. This skill stacks.

361_1.name: Field of Snakes
361_1._originalDescription: Mitarashi Anko (B) deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies, who will take 5 affliction damage the following 2 turns. This damage cannot be increased or decreased. For 3 turns, all enemies will take 5 additional damage from 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' and Mitarashi Anko (B)'s team will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

361_2.name: Sly Mind Affect Technique
361_2._originalDescription: Mitarashi Anko (B) targets all enemies, increasing the cost of their physical and energy skills by 1 white energy for 2 turns. During this time, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands'.

361_3.name: Snake Hands Defense
361_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

361_4.name: Achievement: Snake Clone
361_4._originalDescription: If Mitarashi Anko (B) is targeted by a new harmful affliction-only skill right after using 'Hidden Shadow Snake Hands', she will achieve 'Achievement: Snake Clone': She becomes invulnerable for 2 turns.

362_0.name: Disruption Cube Field
362_0._originalDescription: Restored Karma Kawaki deals 10 damage to all enemies and stuns their mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

362_1.name: Hell on Earth
362_1._originalDescription: Restored Karma Kawaki targets one enemy for 2 turns, each turn dealing 10 damage to them and stunning their non-mental skills.

362_2.name: Perfect Karma Palm Thrust
362_2._originalDescription: Restored Karma Kawaki deals 35 affliction damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, the non-conditional stun, energy removal or energy steal effects of that enemy's new skills will take no effect. This skill deals 10 additional damage for every 30 health Restored Karma Kawaki has lost.

362_3.name: Perfect Karma Relocation
362_3._originalDescription: Restored Karma Kawaki targets his team. For 1 turn, all new harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on them will be reflected back to their users. During this time, everytime any of them is targeted by a new harmful physical, mental or strategic skill, they will gain 1 red energy. This skill is invisible.

362_4.name: Achievement: Isshiki's Doujutsu
362_4._originalDescription: If Restored Karma Kawaki uses 'Disruption Cube Field', 'Hell on Earth' and 'Perfect Karma Palm Thrust' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Isshiki's Doujutsu': For the rest of the game, he will gain 1 additional red energy each turn.

363_0.name: Veteran Revolving Heaven
363_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hiashi (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

363_1.name: Veteran Gentle Fist
363_1._originalDescription: Hyuuga Hiashi (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.

363_2.name: Power Mastery
363_2._originalDescription: First use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. Second use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will have 1 less turn of cooldown permanently. Third use: 'Veteran Revolving Heaven' will ignore invulnerability and 'Veteran Gentle Fist' will remove 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill can only be used 3 times.

363_3.name: Byakugan: Reactive Defense
363_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

363_4.name: Achievement: Byakugan Mastery
363_4._originalDescription: If Hyuuga Hiashi (B) uses 'Byakugan: Reactive Defense' with 3 stacks of 'Power Mastery', he will achieve 'Achievement: Byakugan Mastery': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and will ignore energy drain or removal effects.

364_0.name: Lightning-Covered Fist
364_0._originalDescription: Akimichi Karui deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, her allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal 20 or less original direct damage to an enemy in any form.

364_1.name: Electric Discharge
364_1._originalDescription: Akimichi Karui deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, her allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal 25 or less original direct damage to an enemy in any form.

364_2.name: Ointment
364_2._originalDescription: Akimichi Karui targets herself or an ally, healing the target for 20 health.

364_3.name: Body Barrier: Ally Protection
364_3._originalDescription: Akimichi Karui makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

364_4.name: Achievement: Fury of the Cloud
364_4._originalDescription: If Akimichi Karui is targeted by a new harmful skill right after using 'Body Barrier: Ally Protection', she will achieve 'Achievement: Fury of the Cloud': For 3 turns, 'Lightning-Covered Fist' and 'Electric Discharge' will deal 20 additional damage.

365_0.name: Corpse Clone Technique
365_0._originalDescription: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone steals 55 health from one enemy. For 2 turns, if this enemy uses a new skill, Shojoji of the Corpse Clone will copy it and will be able to use it for no cost for 1 turn.

365_1.name: Sword of the Wind Count
365_1._originalDescription: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. During this time, everytime they don't use a new skill, they will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack on an enemy and will re-apply itself.

365_2.name: Shield of the Wind Count
365_2._originalDescription: Shojoji of the Corpse Clone targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will be dealt 30 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

365_3.name: Strong Hand Block
365_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Shojoji of the Corpse Clone invulnerable for 1 turn.

365_4.name: Achievement: Wind Count Reinforcement
365_4._originalDescription: If Shojoji of the Corpse Clone uses 'Sword of the Wind Count' at least 3 times in the game and then uses 'Strong Hand Block' anytime after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Wind Count Reinforcement': For 3 turns, new uses of 'Sword of the Wind Count' will target all enemies instead and new uses of 'Shield of the Wind Count' will target Shojoji of the Corpse Clone's entire team instead.

366_0.name: Cloud-Style Deception Beheading
366_0._originalDescription: Omoi (B) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If Omoi (B)'s health is at 70 or below, this skill will increase the damage of its further uses by 5 permanently. This skill stacks and removes all helpful skills from Omoi (B) afterwards, but it cannot be removed itself.

366_1.name: Cloud-Style Afterimage
366_1._originalDescription: Omoi (B) takes 15 affliction damage* that cannot kill him. The turn after, he will be healed for 30 health. The next time 'Cloud-Style Deception Beheading' is used, it will deal another instance of 20 piercing damage to its target. This skill stacks up to 3 times.

366_2.name: Lightning Release: Shadow Clone
366_2._originalDescription: Omoi (B) targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the target will be unable to be killed and any enemy who uses a new skill on them will take 5 piercing damage instantly and each following turn permanently. This skill is invisible and stacks.

366_3.name: Cloud-Style Sword Parry
366_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Omoi (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

366_4.name: Achievement: Coordinated Fight
366_4._originalDescription: If Omoi (B) uses 'Lightning Release: Shadow Clone' while having 25 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Coordinated Fight': The next use of 'Cloud-Style Deception Beheading' will also increase the physical and energy damage of Omoi (B)'s allies by 10 permanently.

367_0.name: Earth Release: Dust Wind
367_0._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Victor's team will have 20 points of damage reduction and all enemies will be unable to use skills with non-conditional stun, counter or reflect effects (this is a stun effect).

367_1.name: Wind Release: Great Balloon
367_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, all enemies will deal 15 less non-affliction damage and any enemy who uses a new skill on Victor will deal 5 less non-affliction damage permanently. For 1 turn, if Victor is targeted by a new harmful skill, 'Lightning Release: Heavenly Lightning' will cost 1 less blue energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

367_2.name: Lightning Release: Heavenly Lightning
367_2._originalDescription: Victor deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.

367_3.name: Walking Stick Defense
367_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Victor invulnerable for 1 turn.

367_4.name: Achievement: Arm Growth
367_4._originalDescription: If Victor uses any skill except 'Walking Stick Defense' while having 30 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Arm Growth': He is healed for 25 health.

368_0.name: Senbon Shower
368_0._originalDescription: Rokushou Aoi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 affliction damage* the following 3 turns. During this time, the main target will ignore healing effects.

368_1.name: Umbrella Shock Wave
368_1._originalDescription: Rokushou Aoi destroys all enemies' destructible defense and deals 10 damage to them. The next time 'Senbon Shower' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This skill stacks.

368_2.name: Sword of the Thunder God
368_2._originalDescription: Permanently, Rokushou Aoi will deal 10 piercing damage instantly to any enemy who uses a new skill on him and during this time, 'Senbon Shower' and 'Umbrella Shock Wave' will be replaced by 'Lightning Moon Cut' and 'Ring of Electricity' respectively. This skill cannot be used while active and ends when Rokushou Aoi uses 'Lightning Moon Cut' 3 times or 'Ring of Electricity' once.

368_3.name: Umbrella Shield
368_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Rokushou Aoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

368_4.name: Lightning Moon Cut
368_4._originalDescription: Rokushou Aoi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks.

368_5.name: Ring of Electricity
368_5._originalDescription: Rokushou Aoi deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns them for 2 turns. For the rest of the game, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns. This skill stacks.

369_0.name: Lightning Ball
369_0._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy, who will take 5 additional damage from Kurosuki Raiga's skills permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Kurosuki Raiga dies.

369_1.name: Feast of Lightning
369_1._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga makes all enemies take 5 additional damage from his skills permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Kurosuki Raiga dies.

369_2.name: Fangs of Lightning
369_2._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and increases the cost of that enemy's non-strategic skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning' permanently after used.

369_3.name: Lightning Strike Armor
369_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kurosuki Raiga invulnerable for 1 turn.

369_4.name: Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning
369_4._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga ends all active control skills on all enemies, deals 15 piercing damage to the main target and 5 piercing damage to all others. This skill becomes 'Siege of Lightning' permanently after used.

369_5.name: Siege of Lightning
369_5._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga targets all enemies. For 2 turns, everytime they use a new skill, they will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill becomes 'Lightning Dragon Tornado' permanently after used.

369_6.name: Lightning Dragon Tornado
369_6._originalDescription: Kurosuki Raiga deals 60 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill becomes 'Lightning Demon' permanently after used.

369_7.name: Lightning Demon
369_7._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Kurosuki Raiga, that enemy will be dealt 100 piercing damage. This skill can only be used once and cannot be removed.

370_0.name: Advanced Mind Body Switch
370_0._originalDescription: Yamanaka Santa targets one enemy, who will take 25 damage at the end of their next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Yamanaka Santa. During this time, if this enemy uses a new skill, it will replace this skill for 1 turn and Yamanaka Santa will be able to use it for no cost. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

370_1.name: Sensory Focus
370_1._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, skills that Yamanaka Santa uses will stun for 1 additional turn if they are stun skills and will deal 5 additional damage if they are non-affliction skills. This skill stacks.

370_2.name: Teamwork Tactics
370_2._originalDescription: Until this skill is used again, Yamanaka Santa targets all allies. Everytime they use a new skill, the destructible defense this skill grants will be increased by 10 points. The next time this skill is used, it will grant Yamanaka Santa's allies 10 points of permanent destructible defense and its usage count will be reset. This skill does not stack on allies and will remove itself from them if already active.

370_3.name: Reactionary Defense
370_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Yamanaka Santa invulnerable for 1 turn.

371_0.name: Straight Line Illusion Cut
371_0._originalDescription: Uchiha Naka deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

371_1.name: Mutilation: Reality Reveal
371_1._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Uchiha Naka's team. If used on an enemy, they will be healed for 10 health and all helpful skills will be removed from them. If used on a member of Uchiha Naka's team, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage* and all harmful skills will be removed from them. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

371_2.name: Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion
371_2._originalDescription: Uchiha Naka gains 4 reality changes and can now use his other skills. Each one of them will consume 1 reality change upon use. This skill becomes 'Precise Kunai Illusion Wave' after used and it ends when all reality changes are consumed.

371_3.name: Aerial Fight
371_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Uchiha Naka invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill requires 'Vicious Izanagi: Reality Distortion' to be active.

371_4.name: Precise Kunai Illusion Wave
371_4._originalDescription: Uchiha Naka deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

372_0.name: Truth: Step 1
372_0._originalDescription: Falls of Truth will deal 10 damage to one enemy at the end of this enemy's next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Falls of Truth. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 1' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

372_1.name: Truth: Step 2
372_1._originalDescription: Falls of Truth will counter the first harmful physical skill used on them for 1 turn. One enemy is targeted. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 2' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

372_2.name: Truth: Step 3
372_2._originalDescription: Falls of Truth will deal 10 piercing damage to one enemy at the end of this enemy's next turn. This damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Falls of Truth. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Truth: Step 3' will be replaced by the skill they used permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be reflected.

372_3.name: Revelation
372_3._originalDescription: The specific energy on this skill's cost changes with each use, going green -> red -> blue -> white. For the rest of the game, Falls of Truth's skills will cost 1 less energy of the type that this skill is costing when used. This skill can only be used 4 times and cannot be removed.

373_0.name: Changeable Smoke Tag
373_0._originalDescription: For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Heiji's allies will have 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. If Edo Tensei Heiji is targeted by a new harmful: physical skill, 'Winding Smoke Assault' and 'Winding Smoke Assist' will cost 1 red energy for 1 turn; energy skill, 1 blue energy; affliction-only skill, 1 white energy. This skill cannot be used while active and its effects activate only once per turn for each class. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Heiji dies.

373_1.name: Winding Smoke Assault
373_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Heiji deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill's secondary effect is different depending on its cost from 'Changeable Smoke Tag'. / Red: The enemy is stunned for 1 turn. / Blue: The enemy takes 15 affliction damage*. / White: The enemy loses 1 random energy. This skill's costs and effects from 'Changeable Smoke Tag' add up.

373_2.name: Winding Smoke Assist
373_2._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Heiji grants one ally 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill's secondary effect is different depending on its cost from 'Changeable Smoke Tag'. / Red: The ally becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. / Blue: The ally is healed for 20 health. / White: The ally gains 1 random energy. This skill's costs and effects from 'Changeable Smoke Tag' add up.

373_3.name: Coffin of Reincarnation
373_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Heiji invulnerable for 1 turn.

374_0.name: Invasion Warning Trap
374_0._originalDescription: The next enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Kisame of the Cypher Division will take 15 damage and this skill will end. While active, this skill will deal 15 additional damage each turn, stacking to a maximum of 45, and it cannot be used again. When triggered, this skill cannot be used for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

374_1.name: Silent Killing
374_1._originalDescription: Kisame of the Cypher Division deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 20 additional damage. This skill ends if Kisame of the Cypher Division is targeted by a new harmful skill. This skill ignores invulnerability.

374_2.name: The Mission Above All
374_2._originalDescription: Kisame of the Cypher Division deals 20 affliction damage* to one ally. For 3 turns, Kisame of the Cypher Division will become invulnerable and 'Silent Killing' will cost 1 random energy instead.

374_3.name: Clever Retreat
374_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kisame of the Cypher Division invulnerable for 1 turn.

375_0.name: Unsealing: Shuriken
375_0._originalDescription: Ajisai deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be reduced by 5 the first turn and by 15 the second turn. This skill becomes 'Enclosing Technique' for 2 turns* after used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

375_1.name: Unsealing: Paper Snowstorm
375_1._originalDescription: Ajisai deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime this enemy uses a new skill, their strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn. While it's active, Ajisai can use this skill for no cost to change the target of it to a new enemy (the damage won't be dealt again). This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

375_2.name: Summoning: Panda
375_2._originalDescription: Ajisai deals 35 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. While it's active, Ajisai can use this skill for no cost to change the target of it to a new enemy (the damage won't be dealt again). This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

375_3.name: Summoning: Rainwater Gate
375_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ajisai invulnerable for 1 turn.

375_4.name: Enclosing Technique
375_4._originalDescription: Ajisai deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and 5 affliction damage to all other enemies.

376_0.name: Area Destruction
376_0._originalDescription: Mecha Kurama deals 10 damage to all enemies. The main target will take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills permanently. This skill stacks.

376_1.name: Violet Beam
376_1._originalDescription: Mecha Kurama becomes invulnerable for 1 turn, deals 30 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.

376_2.name: Power Conversion
376_2._originalDescription: Mecha Kurama deals 20 affliction damage* to itself or an ally. Mecha Kurama gains 25 points of permanent destructible defense and increases the damage of its skills by 10 permanently. This skill stacks.

376_3.name: Hiding in Wreckage
376_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Mecha Kurama invulnerable for 1 turn.

377_0.name: Exploding Kunai Assault
377_0._originalDescription: Kyuusuke deals 10 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to one enemy. The next time 'Swift Foot: Punch' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This skill stacks.

377_1.name: Swift Foot: Punch
377_1._originalDescription: Kyuusuke deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Kyuusuke will ignore enemy stun effects. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

377_2.name: Lava Release: Quicklime Congealing
377_2._originalDescription: Kyuusuke deals 10 damage to one enemy that doubles each turn for the rest of the game. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill cannot be reflected.

377_3.name: Swift Foot Kyuusuke
377_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kyuusuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

378_0.name: Axe Maneuver: Side Strike
378_0._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin destroys one enemy's destructible defense and deals 20 damage to them.

378_1.name: Axe Maneuver: Spin Trap
378_1._originalDescription: Edo Tensei Sand Jester Nin stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 3 turns, if this enemy is targeted by 'Axe Maneuver: Side Strike', this stun effect will be applied again.

378_2.name: Axe Maneuver: Dust Wind

379_1._originalDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Daibutsu's team. If used on an enemy, Daibutsu deals 25 piercing damage to them and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn. If used on a member of Daibutsu's team, Daibutsu heals them for 25 health and removes all enemy affliction skills from them.

380_0.name: Spiked Bomb

If used on a member of Edo Tensei Chuukaku's team, they will have all harmful skills removed from them, will be healed for 30 health and then will become invulnerable to harmful skills for 2 turns.

382_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Daimaru targets himself or an ally, granting the target 35 points of destructible defense and making them ignore enemy stun effects. During this time, 'Earth Release: Sand Dance' and 'Pushover' will last 1 additional turn.

382_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Edo Tensei Daimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

Yuukimaru also gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn, increased by 5 for each time he has used 'Three-Tails Chakra: Release', 'Isobu: Tail Slam' and 'Isobu: Great Water Mass Bullet' in the game.

385_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Nurari invulnerable for 1 turn.

386_0._originalDescription: First use: Kihou deals 40 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. Second use: Kihou deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to strategic skills for 1 turn. Third use: Kihou deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes his team invulnerable to mental skills for 1 turn and this skill will then need 'Reload' so it can be used again.

This skill ends on any enemy that uses a new skill.

402_0.name: Mastered Taijutsu
402_0._originalDescription: One random enemy will have all their destructible defense destroyed, take 25 damage and become unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

404_0.name: Lightning-Covered Descending Fist
404_0._originalDescription: Lightning Suit Denki deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. Until 'Lightning-Covered Flying Kick' is used on that enemy, everytime they don't use a new skill they will take 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

404_1._originalDescription: Lightning Suit Denki deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. Until 'Lightning-Covered Descending Fist' is used on that enemy, everytime they use a new skill they will take 5 piercing damage. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

405_0.name: Kyuubi-Enhanced Beast Tearing Palm
405_0._originalDescription: Kyuubi Sora deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Kyuubi Sora will take 15 affliction damage instantly. For 1 turn, 'Great Wind Roar' will be improved.

405_1.name: Great Wind Roar
405_1._originalDescription: Kyuubi Sora deals X damage to one enemy, where X equals half of Kyuubi Sora's missing health. If improved, X will equal Kyuubi Sora's missing health instead.

405_2.name: Tailed-Beast Fury
405_2._originalDescription: Kyuubi Sora takes 20 affliction damage* that cannot kill him and gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks.

405_3.name: Enraged Insight
405_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kyuubi Sora invulnerable for 1 turn.

406_0.name: Pressure Fist
406_0._originalDescription: Maito Gai (B) deals 20 damage to one enemy. The next physical skill that enemy uses will deal 10 less damage. This skill stacks.

406_1.name: Wheelchair Run
406_1._originalDescription: For 4 turns, Maito Gai (B) will have 10 points of damage reduction and 'Pressure Fist' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

406_2.name: Air Kick Interruption
406_2._originalDescription: Maito Gai (B) targets all enemies. The next physical or energy skill they use will be countered and this skill will then end on them. This skill cannot be used on enemies already affected by it. If used during 'Wheelchair Run', this skill will be invisible the first turn.

406_3.name: Effortless Defense
406_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Maito Gai (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

406_4.name: Achievement: On Your Feet!
406_4._originalDescription: If Maito Gai (B) uses 'Air Kick Interruption' while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: On Your Feet!': For the rest of the game, new uses of 'Wheelchair Run' will not grant damage reduction and will increase the damage of 'Pressure Fist' by 20 instead.

407_0.name: Gelel Blast
407_0._originalDescription: Haido deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 4 turns. For the rest of the game, 'Gelel Resurrection' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks and ends if Haido dies.

407_1.name: Gelel Laser
407_1._originalDescription: Haido deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. For the rest of the game, 'Gelel Resurrection' will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks and ends if Haido dies.

407_2.name: Gelel Resurrection
407_2._originalDescription: The next time Haido's health reaches 0, he will have his health set to 50. This skill cannot be used while active.

407_3.name: Impervious Barrier
407_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Haido invulnerable for 1 turn.

408_0.name: Executioner Rush
408_0._originalDescription: Onomichi Hassaku deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage for every 25 health Onomichi Hassaku has lost, and then 5 additional damage for every 25 health the target enemy have lost.

408_1.name: Flash Slash
408_1._originalDescription: Onomichi Hassaku steals 10 health from one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

408_2.name: Declaration of Rivalry
408_2._originalDescription: Onomichi Hassaku targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, the main target will take 10 additional damage from Onomichi Hassaku's skills and the other targets will take 10 less damage from Onomichi Hassaku's skills. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill will end if Onomichi Hassaku dies.

408_3.name: Executioner Parry
408_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Onomichi Hassaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

408_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
408_4._originalDescription: If Onomichi Hassaku uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

409_0.name: Kabutowari: Hammer Smash
409_0._originalDescription: Fuefuki Kyohou deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's physical skills for 1 turn.

409_1.name: Kabutowari: Axe Cut
409_1._originalDescription: Fuefuki Kyohou deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's non-physical skills for 1 turn.

409_2.name: Combined Combat
409_2._originalDescription: Fuefuki Kyohou gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if either 'Kabutowari: Hammer Smash' or 'Kabutowari: Axe Cut' is used, the other mentioned skill will be applied on the same enemy.

409_3.name: Long-Distance Deflection
409_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Fuefuki Kyohou invulnerable for 1 turn.

409_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
409_4._originalDescription: If Fuefuki Kyohou uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

410_0.name: Longsword Ninja Art: Needle Shot
410_0._originalDescription: Hebiichigo deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

410_1.name: Stitching Dance
410_1._originalDescription: Until 'Longsword Ninja Art: Massacre Method' is used, its next use will last 3 turns instead. During this time, 'Longsword Ninja Art: Needle Shot' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Hebiichigo' will have 15 points of damage reduction. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

410_2.name: Longsword Ninja Art: Massacre Method
410_2._originalDescription: Hebiichigo stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from damaging skills.

410_3.name: Defensive Wire Maneuvering
410_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hebiichigo invulnerable for 1 turn.

410_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
410_4._originalDescription: If Hebiichigo uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, her harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

411_0.name: Shibuki: Front Explosion
411_0._originalDescription: Oniyuzu Ichirouta deals 20 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Suicide Explosion' will deal affliction damage instead.

411_1.name: Shibuki: Ground Explosion
411_1._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Oniyuzu Ichirouta will make his team invulnerable and will make all enemies unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. For 1 turn, 'Suicide Explosion' will deal 20 affliction damage to Oniyuzu Ichirouta instead.

411_2.name: Suicide Explosion
411_2._originalDescription: Oniyuzu Ichirouta deals 40 damage to one enemy and to another random enemy. Oniyuzu Ichirouta takes 40 affliction damage*.

411_3.name: Shibuki Parry
411_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Oniyuzu Ichirouta invulnerable for 1 turn.

411_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
411_4._originalDescription: If Oniyuzu Ichirouta uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

412_0.name: Lightning Fish
412_0._originalDescription: Kurosuki Buntan deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Lightning Ball'.

412_1.name: Lightning Ball
412_1._originalDescription: Kurosuki Buntan deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Lightning Fish'.

412_2.name: Lightning Burial: Banquet of Lightning
412_2._originalDescription: Kurosuki Buntan deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, every enemy who uses a new skill on any member of Kurosuki Buntan's team will take 5 piercing damage.

412_3.name: Lightning Strike Armor
412_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Kurosuki Buntan invulnerable for 1 turn.

412_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
412_4._originalDescription: If Kurosuki Buntan uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, her harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

413_0.name: Long-Sword Form: Destruction
413_0._originalDescription: Karatachi Kagura deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy dies after this skill is used on them, then for 1 turn the original specific energies in the costs of Karatachi Kagura's skills will be random energies instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.

413_1.name: Clear Mirror Still Water
413_1._originalDescription: Karatachi Kagura targets one ally or himself. For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on that character will be reflected onto the enemy team. This skill is invisible.

413_2.name: Hammer Form: Destruction
413_2._originalDescription: Karatachi Kagura deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 3 random energies from them. For 1 turn, Karatachi Kagura's other skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

413_3.name: Hiramekarei Protection
413_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Karatachi Kagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

413_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
413_4._originalDescription: If Karatachi Kagura uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

414_0.name: Water Release: Water Spikes
414_0._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Shizuma deals 10 piercing damage twice to one enemy.

414_1.name: Samehada Shred
414_1._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Shizuma steals 20 health from one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill with an energy gain/removal/stealing effect, they will take 20 piercing damage.

414_2.name: Bloody Mist Absorption
414_2._originalDescription: Hoshigaki Shizuma targets all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, any new invisible skill they use will be visible, their affliction-only skills will deal 10 less damage and consecutive uses of 'Water Release: Water Spikes' or 'Samehada Shred' will also remove 1 random energy from their targets.

414_3.name: Samehada Wind Deflection
414_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hoshigaki Shizuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

414_4.name: Achievement: Swordsmen Call
414_4._originalDescription: If Hoshigaki Shizuma uses any harmful skill while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Swordsmen Call': For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will also make their enemy targets take 5 additional damage from all New Seven Ninja Swordsmen's damage skills permanently. This damage increase effect happens before anything on the skill used.

415_0.name: Thoughtless Blow
415_0._originalDescription: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies he is able to, destroying their destructible defense and dealing 25 piercing damage to them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

415_1.name: Thoughtless Bite
415_1._originalDescription: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies he is able to, dealing 35 piercing damage to them and removing 1 random energy from each one of them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

415_2.name: Thoughtless Fight
415_2._originalDescription: Samehada Fusion Shizuma targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new harmful skill, they will be able to be targeted by 'Thoughtless Blow' and 'Thoughtless Bite' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be used while active and ends if Samehada Fusion Shizuma dies. This skill cannot be removed.

415_3.name: Thoughtless Dodge
415_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Samehada Fusion Shizuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

415_4.name: Achievement: A Fair Trade
415_4._originalDescription: If Samehada Fusion Shizuma uses 'Thoughtless Fight' while not being at full health, he will achieve 'Achievement: A Fair Trade': He takes 25 affliction damage* and gains 2 random energies.

416_0.name: String Light Formation
416_0._originalDescription: Umino Iruka (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill deals 15 additional damage and stuns for 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Fluid Chakra Control' Umino Iruka (S) has, then all stacks of it are removed.

416_1.name: Surprise Team Tactics
416_1._originalDescription: Umino Iruka (S) targets his team, granting them 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and healing them for 5 health. This skill heals 5 additional health and grants damage reduction for 1 additional turn for each stack of 'Fluid Chakra Control' Umino Iruka (S) has, then all stacks of it are removed.

416_2.name: Fluid Chakra Control
416_2._originalDescription: Umino Iruka (S) heals himself or an ally for 15 health, increased by 5 for each 15 health Umino Iruka (S) has lost. The next use of 'String Light Formation' or 'Surprise Team Tactics' will be improved. This skill stacks.

416_3.name: Instant Dodge
416_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Umino Iruka (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

417_0.name: Kusari Strike
417_0._originalDescription: Furui deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if 'Kusari Hold' is used on them, its damage increase effect will be 25 instead.

417_1.name: Kusari Hold
417_1._originalDescription: Furui stuns one enemy's strategic skills for 1 turn. After 3 turns, this enemy will take 0 damage, increased by 20 for each skill they used during this skill. This skill ends if Furui dies.

417_2.name: Lightning Release: Kusari Charge
417_2._originalDescription: For 3 turns, 'Kusari Strike' and 'Kusari Hold' will deal piercing damage, will ignore invulnerability and any enemy who uses a new skill on Furui will take 10 piercing damage.

417_3.name: Kusari Barrier
417_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Furui invulnerable for 1 turn.

418_0.name: Sedative
418_0._originalDescription: Morino Ibiki (B) stuns one enemy for 3 turns. This skill ends if the enemy successfully receives new harmful damage.

418_1.name: Ground Boulder
418_1._originalDescription: Morino Ibiki (B) deals 30 damage to one enemy. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be reduced by 10 for 2 turns. This skill ends if the enemy successfully receives new harmful damage.

418_2.name: Selfless Rescue
418_2._originalDescription: For 1 turn, all new harmful skills used on Morino Ibiki (B)'s allies will be reflected to him. During this time, Morino Ibiki (B) cannot be killed. This skill is invisible.

418_3.name: Defense Movement Tactics
418_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Morino Ibiki (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

418_4.name: Achievement: Torture Genjutsu
418_4._originalDescription: If Morino Ibiki (B) uses 'Sedative' twice in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Torture Genjutsu': 'Sedative' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, new uses of 'Sedative' will also deal 30 affliction damage to its target instantly.

419_0.name: Bijuu Telepathy
419_0._originalDescription: For 2 turns, Killer Bee (B) and one random member of his team will have 20 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.

419_1.name: Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb
419_1._originalDescription: Killer Bee (B) deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill requires 'Gyuuki's Awakening Control' to be active.

419_2.name: Gyuuki's Awakening Control
419_2._originalDescription: Killer Bee (B) gains 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Bijuu Telepathy' cannot be used and 'Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb' can. This skill is also instantly activated if 'Tailed-Beast Piercing Bomb' is used.

419_3.name: Quick Reaction
419_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Killer Bee (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

419_4.name: Achievement: Octopus Leg Clone
419_4._originalDescription: If Killer Bee (B) uses 'Bijuu Telepathy' 4 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Octopus Leg Clone': 'Bijuu Telepathy' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, all harmful skills will be removed from him each turn.

420_0.name: Expert Kenjutsu: Attack
420_0._originalDescription: Log deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Log will gain 20 points of destructible defense and will ignore enemy stun effects.

420_1.name: Armor-Eater
420_1._originalDescription: Log heals himself for 15 health. The first time it's used, this skill will permanently make 'Expert Kenjutsu: Attack' deal 20 additional damage and not grant destructible defense. The second time it's used, this skill will permanently make 'Expert Kenjutsu: Attack' stun its target for 1 turn and not make Log ignore enemy stun effects. This skill can only be used twice.

420_2.name: Temporary Paralysis Technique
420_2._originalDescription: Log reduces one enemy's physical and energy damage by 5 permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical or strategic skill, then for 3 turns 'Temporary Paralysis Technique' will cost 1 random energy and will have no cooldown. This effect does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Log dies.

420_3.name: Expert Kenjutsu: Defense
420_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Log invulnerable for 1 turn.

420_4.name: Achievement: Restraining Liquid
420_4._originalDescription: If Log uses 'Armor-Eater' for the second time while having 50 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Restraining Liquid': For the rest of the game, every enemy that uses a new skill on Log will have their physical and strategic skills stunned for 1 turn.

421_0.name: Senrigan: Clairvoyance
421_0._originalDescription: For 1 turn, Ada will take 5 additional damage from damaging skills and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. One enemy is targeted. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, they will be countered and healed for 20 health. The target of this skill is invisible. If this skill is empowered, it won't increase the damage Ada takes from damaging skills.

421_1.name: Omnipotence's Seduction
421_1._originalDescription: Ada deals 10 damage to one enemy and for 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new physical, energy, mental or affliction skill, Ada will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with that same main class. If this skill is empowered, it may trigger to strategic skills too.

421_2.name: Love Threat
421_2._originalDescription: Ada targets one ally. For the rest of the game, every enemy that uses a new skill on that ally will take 5 additional damage from 'Omnipotence's Seduction' for 1 turn. This skill stacks. If this skill is empowered, that ally will also ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn.

421_3.name: Ada's Stasis Pod
421_3._originalDescription: For 3 turns, Ada becomes invulnerable, unable to use her skills and unable to be killed. If this skill is empowered, it won't make 'Omnipotence's Seduction' unable to be used along with the other skills.

421_4.name: Achievement: Omnipotence's Desire
421_4._originalDescription: If Ada uses a new skill, she will achieve 'Achievement: Omnipotence's Desire': Her skills will be empowered for 1 turn.

422_0.name: Human Reflection Backpack
422_0._originalDescription: Daemon targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on that ally will be reflected back upon their users. This skill is invisible.

422_1.name: Intended Reflection
422_1._originalDescription: Daemon targets one ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on Daemon will be reflected back upon their users. This skill is invisible and needs an available ally to be used on.

422_2.name: Science-Enhanced Taijutsu
422_2._originalDescription: Daemon deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Human Reflection Backpack' and 'Intended Reflection' will be visible if used.

422_3.name: Daemon's Stasis Pod
422_3._originalDescription: For 3 turns, Daemon becomes invulnerable, unable to use his skills and unable to be killed.

422_4.name: Achievement: Initial Reflection
422_4._originalDescription: If Daemon uses 'Science-Enhanced Taijutsu' for the first time in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Initial Reflection': For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on him will be reflected back upon their users.

423_0.name: Thug Call
423_0._originalDescription: The next enemy that uses a new skill on Gatou will take 20 damage and then 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills permanently. This skill stacks.

423_1.name: Bloodful Command
423_1._originalDescription: The next enemy that uses a new skill on Gatou will take 10 damage and then 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills permanently. This skill stacks.

423_2.name: Public Crucifixion
423_2._originalDescription: Gatou deals 15 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills. This skill stacks.

423_3.name: Crimelord Mind
423_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Gatou invulnerable for 1 turn.

424_0.name: Hyuuga Rush
424_0._originalDescription: Hyuuga Tokuma deals 20 damage to one enemy. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical skills.

424_1.name: Pressure Point Reveal
424_1._originalDescription: Hyuuga Tokuma targets one enemy. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will lose 1 random energy everytime they take harmful damage.

424_2.name: Insightful Prediction
424_2._originalDescription: Hyuuga Tokuma targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new invisible skill, they will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

424_3.name: Strategic Hiding
424_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Hyuuga Tokuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

425_0.name: Deep Crimson Dance
425_0._originalDescription: Shizuka deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 less random energy.

425_1.name: Hardliner Gale Fist
425_1._originalDescription: Shizuka targets one enemy. If this enemy's health is at 30 or below, they will be instantly killed. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

425_2.name: Violent Whirlwind
425_2._originalDescription: Shizuka targets all enemies for 3 turns, increasing the cooldown of any new skill they use by 2 turns.

425_3.name: Nadeshiko-Style Acrobatics
425_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Shizuka invulnerable for 1 turn. Shizuka also instantly gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn everytime she uses a new skill (except this one).

426_0.name: Akuta
426_0._originalDescription: Ohnoki (B) gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense, then grants 20 points of permanent destructible defense to one random member of his team, then grants 10 points of permanent destructible defense to his team. This skill stacks.

426_1.name: Attachment of the Primitive World
426_1._originalDescription: Ohnoki (B) targets himself or an ally, granting the target 30 points of damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time, everytime they take new non-affliction damage, 'Speedy Dust Release' will deal 15 additional damage for 1 turn. This effect stacks.

426_2.name: Speedy Dust Release
426_2._originalDescription: Ohnoki (B) deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, if this enemy uses a new skill that directly grants damage reduction or destructible defense, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

426_3.name: Floating Chair
426_3._originalDescription: This skill makes Ohnoki (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

426_4.name: Achievement: Speed Floating
426_4._originalDescription: If Ohnoki (B) is targeted by a new harmful non-strategic skill right after using 'Floating Chair', he will achieve 'Achievement: Speed Floating': For the rest of the game, he will have 15 points of damage reduction. This damage reduction effect cannot be ignored.

427_0.name: Wind Blast
427_0._originalDescription: White Zetsu Monster deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, White Zetsu Monster's team will have 5 points of damage reduction.

427_1.name: Lightning Blast
427_1._originalDescription: White Zetsu Monster deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any enemy who uses a new skill on White Zetsu Monster will take 10 piercing damage.

427_2.name: Flame Blast
427_2._originalDescription: White Zetsu Monster deals 50 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, White Zetsu Monster will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

427_3.name: Impervious Skin
427_3._originalDescription: This skill makes White Zetsu Monster invulnerable for 1 turn.

427_4.name: Achievement: Three-Element Blast
427_4._originalDescription: If White Zetsu Monster uses 'Wind Blast', 'Lightning Blast' or 'Flame Blast' while the other 2 are both active, he will achieve 'Achievement: Three-Element Blast': White Zetsu Monster's skills are removed from him. For 1 turn, if used, 'Wind Blast', 'Lightning Blast' and 'Flame Blast' will also apply the other 2 mentioned skills on the enemy target.
